name: Kasel
subtitle: Warrior of the Holy Sword
description: The Chosen Warrior of the Holy Sword Aea, the sword that saved the world once before. He can push back enemies and enhance himself with the power of this holy sword.
story: A squire of the Kingdom of Orvelia. Traumatized by witnessing the deaths of his parents at the hands of the Demons invading the village, and later, the assassination of his sword teacher, he fears the idea of anyone around him dying. His past has driven him to seek out his sworn brother from his early years in the orphanage, Clause, who joined an expedition, but never returned.

inn.idle: Is it ok to rest...even if rest is needed...

recruit.greet: It's been a while. How are you?
talk: I hope the world becomes peaceful soon.
This sword...is heavy.
I don't believe in fate.
recruit.gift: Thank you. This will help end the battle quickly.

affinity.greet: I'm seeing you around quite often. Are you getting to the capital now?
talk: Will all this end once I find the power of the Holy Sword?
I don't want to be swayed by anyone else. I'll go my own way.
affinity.gift: A gift for an unpopular man like myself... Thank you.

relationship.greet: I am always thankful for your help.
talk: It would be a lie to say it isn't difficult, but that's life, I guess.
Thank you for sharing my burden. Really.
There is no such thing as a perfect life. Well, there are some perfect moments, though. Haha...

According to the legend, the Hero King Kyle used this sword to pierce the heart of the Dark Lord Angmund and brought an end to the war. However, the two simply vanished, and only Aea remained.

After Angmund was defeated, the Crown of Light, along with the Holy Sword, Aea, was left in the place where the king disappeared.

t5.dark: Upon attacking, deals additional DMG equal to 80% of ATK.

name: Frey
subtitle: Priestess of Light
description: A childhood friend of Kasel's, she is a priestess who serves the Goddess. She heals and protects allies with the power of light. With the blessings of the Goddess, she can temporarily increase one's magic powers and resistance.
story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

inn.idle: Goddess Lua, whom within the Light resides - let our faith never waver.

recruit.greet: May Lua's blessing be with you.
talk: My relationship with Kasel? Haha, we're like family. I guess I'm like his guardian?
I wonder how High Priestess Iris is doing. I haven't seen her ever since I left...
Haha, don't Roi and Cleo make a nice couple?
recruit.gift: Wow, thank you.

affinity.greet: There you are. You didn't get hurt, did you?
talk: I see a bright light in my dreams sometimes. People with white wings with a brilliant sun behind them...
Who I like? Th-that's a secret between me and Lua.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I won't forget your thoughtfulness.

relationship.greet: I sincerely pray that Lua watches over you.
talk: Kasel's safety is important. He was chosen by the Goddess, after all.
All decisions can be met with disdain. I do not mind, as long as the Goddess is happy with it.
The relationship between God and priests is not so different from a relationship between simple people. Sometimes...we disagree.

However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.

name: Cleo
subtitle: Sorceress of Purgatory
description: A sorceress from the Red Tower, this brave girl uses explosive fire magic to deal damage to multiple enemies, and then inflicts even greater damage by causing the embers to explode.
story: Cleo's earliest memory begins at the Tower of Sage. Raised by Dominiks the Great Sage as an orphan, she is both a genius wizard and a troublemaker. Her inability to control her own power has often led to trouble, including partial destruction of the Red Tower, her own residence. Despite this, her apparent immunity to the wrath of the Great Sage has caused her to be ostracized from her peers. Although this has led her to become selfish and inconsiderate, deep inside, she is still a kindhearted girl who fears abandonment by others.

inn.idle: Ah~ so bored. I wish there were some fun magic tools lying around.

recruit.greet: Hello! I'm Cleo. An Archmage!
talk: Want some meat? I can cook it for you?
Curious about fire magic? Hehehe, I could teach you, but not anyone can do it.
Why do people call me the Sorceress of Purgatory? I don't like it. Call me an Archmage!!
recruit.gift: Heh, I like you.

affinity.greet: You're late! How dare you make the Archmage wait!?
talk: Who do I like more, between Frey and Roi? Does that question even make sense? Of course, Frey!
I wonder where my mom is... As long as I'm alive, I should be able to meet her, right?
affinity.gift: Oh! I think it will fit the Archmage! Thank you!

relationship.greet: Oho, so you've come to see the best Archmage ever!
talk: Frey is more than a pillow to me!
Don't forget. It's thanks to me that we can get around so fast.
You'll stick around with us, right?

Over the ages, it ended up in the hands of an archmage, who turned it into the core of his staff. Later, the archmage presented this staff to his precious disciple.

It's very powerful, but it also requires a lot of mana. Cleo took the Scroll of Purgatory from the Tower of Sage, which was considered a forbidden scroll. Now she's using it to enhance her Fire Rain.

t5.dark: If a target has 10 stacks of Ember, increases the M.DMG the target takes by 30%, and adds 2 stacks of Ember per second to all non-hero enemies.

name: Roi
subtitle: Swift Assassin
description: He is a former assassin with a hidden past. He specializes in single targets, launching strong, endless attacks on enemies while dashing around their blind spots.
story: He is Cleo's escort and is protecting her at Dominiks's request. A former member of a group of assassins, he risked his life and went rogue for some unknown reason. Having lived as an assassin, he rarely shows much respect toward others, but his hardships have made him an experienced and shrewd man who treats those who help him with fairness.

recruit.greet: What is it.
talk: I would appreciate if you didn't ask about the past.
It's been a while since it was so peaceful. I just hope Cleo doesn't start anything.
Stop trying to couple me with Cleo. Frey is enough, already. I'm only doing this because it must be done.
recruit.gift: I don't know if I deserve this....

affinity.greet: Hey, you should take a rest now.
talk: Aren't you sick of this? Cleo is my responsibility... I heard she'll be taking on an important role now.
Have you ever done something you regretted? If you think you'll regret it, then stop right now.
affinity.gift: You never forget... Thanks.

relationship.greet: Ah, you've come.
talk: Help Kasel when you can. He has a heavy burden.
While I'm not the devout type, I also rely on Lua. I can't do much but pray for the people I've killed, after all...
I do not mourn my past anymore. It can't be changed. What can be changed, however, is the future.

Only the best assassin of the Laughing Mask is allowed to wield this dreadful pair of daggers. It is said that the wounds inflicted by these daggers never heal, and that their victims inevitably bleed to death. According to the legend, these daggers were made from the scythe of the Grim Reaper.

name: Gau
subtitle: Barbarian of Frozen Lands
description: A barbarian that rules the snowy plains of the frozen land, he undermines the morale of enemies with ear-deafening shouts and charges into them like a storm.
story: Gau is a powerful warrior from the Barbarian Kingdom. Whenever he swung his twin axes, a bloodbath would follow. As a warrior, he was feared for his peerless ferocity. However, he suddenly disappeared for 10 years. When he returned, he was a completely changed man. His violent Barbarian tendencies were all gone, even when others criticized him. Instead, he now faces them with smiles and jolly laughter. The kind, warm gaze he now shows to children and animals is especially surprising.

inn.idle: You have some business with a barbarian?

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you. Let's go hunting together sometime.
talk: I look strong? Eh, stop making me blush.
All those beauties around you, don't make me jealous, buddy!
I am indeed strong, hah.
recruit.gift: What's all this? Thanks, man.

affinity.greet: It's kind of embarrassing to be doing this.
talk: Have you seen Yanne lately? I wonder how she's doing...
What? How I know Lewisia? That kid... Even though she's older... It's not like it'll work out just because I like her...
affinity.gift: Thank you. I'll treat you next time.

relationship.greet: Ha! We meet again! Doing well?
talk: Ah...that little Lei became such a fine lady...and to think that her real age was...hahaha!
I'll shatter you to pieces! - Well, how was that? The kids laugh when I act like that.
Hahaha, me and some old dwarf drank a lot last time. Actually, we drank all the alcohol at the Inn! Hahahaha!!

This beast, capable of dispelling the power of darkness, is supposed to be a blue phoenix composed of ice. Created in the shape of this beast is Numinu, its name means 'holy.' It has been crafted from enchanted ice that never melts. Considered a holy relic among Barbarians, this weapon is bestowed to their mightiest warrior. The wielder of this weapon is the most powerful warrior among Barbarians, and may be considered their king.

name: Phillop
subtitle: King of Dwarves
description: A legendary dragon slayer who has hunted numerous dragons. Despite his small stature, his powerful shield bash destroys enemy formations, usually followed with a final blow.
story: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.
like: Drinks, sand bath, smithing, and crafting
dislike: Long conferences, the royal throne, Demons (especially the Dark Dragons)

inn.idle: Can a human outdrink a dwarf?

recruit.greet: Woa, ha ha. Y'all remind me of back in the days.
talk: The king of dwarves? The title is nothing but a bother.
The size of the bed here doesn't quite fit. But I'm not going back home yet!
To compare to us dwarves, humans never know how to enjoy their life!
recruit.gift: Is this a remembrance of our encounter? Hahaha. I will treasure it.

affinity.greet: Welcome. Here! Raise your glass!
talk: The war from 100 years ago... I was as young as you when I was with King Kyle...
Sometimes, I miss my days as a warrior. Back then, I didn't have this many problems.
affinity.gift: You didn't have to. I would have preferred liquor, though. Ha ha!

relationship.greet: Hello, friend! Have a drink, eh?
talk: I killed plenty of Mad Dragons and Draconics back in my day. Enough to curl any dwarfish beard, eh.
Need a new weapon? I do have some Dwarfish axes back in my trunk.
Hahaha, you're a funny one. Yes, if you ever need the aid of the Dwarves, we will be there to help.

uw.story: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrators of the world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and the shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons and Mad Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.

name: Lakrak
subtitle: Hand Cannon's Hunter
description: A white goblin skilled in mechanical engineering, he uses a hand cannon to inflict explosive damage, harass enemies with special bullets, and inflict fatal damage to them.
story: This eccentric albino Goblin enjoys developing powerful weapons more than anything else. Having been harassed and ostracized by other Goblins due to his skin color, he feels no compassion toward his kind. He would gladly shoot, blow up, and smash even a fellow Goblin to test his weapons. However, he also expresses his gratitude to those who help him, and this is how he became Roi's friend. Unfortunately, he is terrible at remembering faces, so he often tries to shoot Roi before he recalls who he is.

inn.idle: No goblins here! Good place.

description: As the longtime Orc Chieftain of the Sky Wind tribe, he uses elemental attacks powered by the sky and wind. Strong bolts of lightning paralyze enemies, while allies are healed and blessed by the wind.
story: This great Orc shaman wields the power of lightning. He is the chieftain of the Skywind Tribe and a respected elder of the Orc Alliance. He has trained countless Orc shamans and is considered their spiritual leader. He is also one of the few shamans who has clairvoyant dreams, and he is wise enough to properly interpret them.

inn.idle: Do you need a hand from an Ork shaman?

recruit.greet: Let me introduce myself. I am the chief of the Skywind tribe, Kaulah.
talk: As I stay here, I came to think that the material civilization of humankind is astonishing.
I miss the wind of the mountaintops. I will have to climb up a nearby mountain, tomorrow.
Though I'm staying in this Inn on business, this uncomfortable bed stops me from having any prophetic dreams.
recruit.gift: I will remember your kindness.

affinity.greet: I hope my wind helps you rest, even if it's for a little while.
talk: I still can't get used to the city. But it's good to see lively people.
The wind will keep blowing, even if time passes... Just like your hardships will also pass.
affinity.gift: I'll use it well during this trip.

relationship.greet: I thought I felt a friendly wind. Welcome back, friend.
talk: Tough as a boulder. Gentle as the breeze. That is how your aura feels.
Have you ever climbed to the top of the mountains in Ogria? True beauty awaits on top of the summit.
I had a premonition last night. One where you saved the world...

name: Epis
subtitle: Captivating Demon
description: A cold-blooded hedonist demon. Using a huge scythe, she harvests the souls of enemies. She suddenly appears in the midst of enemies, slashing everything around her.
story: This playful and bewitching succubus acts on her own whims. As expected of her Demon lineage, she is a hedonist driven by what she finds fun and enjoyable. Even during the Demon War, she chose traveling around on her own over joining the invasion. In her eyes, fighting alongside Kyle was interesting enough for her to even betray her own kind. When she later met Kasel, she gladly joined his party, knowing that she found another fun adventure for herself. When she finds attractive men, she sometimes visits them in their dreams.
like: Anything that strikes interest or curiosity

inn.idle: Hm hmm hmm~ (humming)

recruit.greet: Are you free today?
talk: Are you blushing? How cute~
Now just where are you staring at? Don't worry, I won't tell anyone...
Hmm..what, you want to try something exciting~?
recruit.gift: Oh, for me? Ooh, now then, what could you want in return~?

affinity.greet: Welcome, dear! Did you close the door?
talk: Oh, what did you expect? Oh, you are devious.
You want to know why a demon is siding with the humans? Does it really look like that? Ha ha.
affinity.gift: Not bad. You seem to know a little something about seduction. So, does that make you more like me?

relationship.greet: Hmm~ based off your expression, I'm assuming you met me in your dreams last night?
talk: Aha~so, how was your dream? Satisfying? Or would you like to continue where it left off...
Haaaah...There's this thing on my mind. I keep thinking about you...Do you know why~?
These clothes seem to be getting tighter. I wonder if I've gained weight...? Do you want to check for me, back at my room?

It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.

name: Selene
subtitle: Wind-piercing Arrow
description: An Elf Princess with a lofty air, she guards the sacred forest. Arrows filled with moon energy follow her will to track down enemies, and arrows filled with wind energy fiercely pierce the enemy.
story: This noble Elven princess admires the Holy Sword and its chosen warrior. She strives as much as she can to do what's right, and wants others to do the same. This is why she offers genuine criticism to anyone who strays from the path of righteousness, even if it's the Warrior of the Holy Sword. Unfortunately, her stout resolve is sometimes taken the wrong way by others. She often visits her younger sister Dosarta at her tower to keep her company.
like: Those who work in harmony and take responsibilities
dislike: Those who abandon their own beliefs Those who flee from danger

inn.idle: Oh, so humans sleep in places like this?

recruit.greet: Have you been doing well? May your day be full of light.
talk: Have I caught your attention?
Refined people are always welcome.
Why not, I guess I could hear you out.
recruit.gift: Thank you for the gift. It's beautiful.

affinity.greet: Today was a great day, having met you.
talk: I've lived to protect the forest since I was young. That's why I always loved the story of the Holy Sword.
The Warrior of the Holy Sword who defeated the Dark Lord and brought peace to the world 100 years ago... Now we must create a new legend.
affinity.gift: This is...! Thank you for your generosity.

relationship.greet: Today seems to be another nice, sunny day - full of the happiness and warmth.
talk: Perhaps I've been too hard on the Warrior, forcing my ideals and thoughts on him...
Visit Elidora Forest at some time. I will greet you personally.
This bow is a special token of friendship given to me by a Wind Elemental. You may touch it if you want.

There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

recruit.greet: Don't greet the Dark Legion so casually, kid.
talk: Don't worry. I'm staying for just the night. My room is upstairs, mind coming up? Hahaha...
You're quite to my liking. In the sense that I want to rip you apart, of course...
Do you know what I'd really like to see? You, begging for your life on your knees.

name: Miruru
subtitle: Cursed Pirate Empress
description: The legendary pirate who was cursed and turned into a little girl. She has the amazing ability to drop cannonballs right on the enemy's head.
story: She once roamed the seas as the pirate empress, instilling fear in sailors' hearts. However, a cursed item has turned her into a child, and all her loyal allies and crew members soon left her. Not one to give up, she started again from the scratch, and now dreams of returning to her former glory. Unfortunately, the curse of childhood has made her way of thinking immature as well. Even so, she continues to chase her dream. Currently, she commands the second Miruru Pirates consisting of Goblins and Gnolls.

inn.idle: How about an alliance? I can give you 10% of all findings!

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you, too!
talk: Together, we can do anything! Even with this cursed body!
The sea is calling us !
I will get back my appearance someday.
recruit.gift: Gold! It's gold!

affinity.greet: Welcome! My Number One honorary subordinate!!!
talk: Hm... My past? Whenever I try to remember something... I go bam!!! And I just fall from the bed.
But there's something I remember. A burning thirst... and writing on a map... The Fountain of Life?
affinity.gift: You really are my subordinate! Now, the treasure trove of the Miruru Pirates is full!

relationship.greet: Heya~ welcome back!!
talk: Let us work hard today as well! For the sake of the Miruru Pirates!
Did you bring any treasure? Where? Where? Where? Show me!
My cannon? Yeah, I made it myself! It's awesome, right? Right?!

uw.story: Back when Miruru reigned as the pirate empress, she was feared by sailors and a major threat to the naval forces of Orvelia and the empire. The cannons on her ship were especially terrifying to the Navy. The most powerful of them was the Leviathan, the ship's main cannon. After being cursed, she took one thing with her as she fled from her mutinous crew. Its value as a weapon is in fact far more valuable than any gold or loot. She took with her the Leviathan, the most powerful cannon in her arsenal. After numerous modifications, the once-terror of the sea now serves as a mobile artillery.

Miruru is using special cannonballs to attack enemies, while waiting for the glorious days to come back once again.

As the gunpowder has a low ignition point, Miruru has been keeping it safe in a turtle powder keg she found in a treasure ship.

t5.dark: Miruru stacks Darkness depending on the number of enemies she hits. When she reaches 50 stacks, she goes berserk, boosting her Atk Spd by 800 and her ATK by 20%.

name: Lorraine
subtitle: Grand Elidoran Scholar
description: The elf druid who joined the Human Allied Forces when the Dark Lord invaded. Communes with nature and attacks enemies using trees.
story: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

inn.idle: Do not be afraid. Ye may be much stronger.

recruit.greet: I'm Lorraine, an Elidora Elf. Salutations.
talk: I had a good time.
May the blessing of mother nature light thy way.
Human beings are astounding creatures, but you have a serious weakness. You are ruled by greed and cannot resist temptation.
recruit.gift: I will treasure this.

affinity.greet: I always welcome the chance to spend time with you.
talk: A major crossroad awaits you. Light and shadow... will converge into one path...
Unlike Elves, who are known for their longevity, humans live shorter lives, but they shine brighter in their prime.
affinity.gift: I'll consider it as a gift given out of your generosity.

relationship.greet: You have grown strong, just, and pure.
talk: You seem to have the purest soul I've seen in a while.
It would be nice if these times of peaceful enjoyment could last forever...but that would be a vice.
I will never forget you. Not as the Sage, but as a simple elf.

uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

name: Clause
subtitle: Knight of Iron Defense
description: Kasel's 'older brother'. A true knight, he is a man of steel who protects allies at the front of the battlefield. He blocks the attacks of the enemies while taking them down, earning him the reputation akin to a castle wall.
story: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

inn.idle: Hahaha! All these familiar faces!

recruit.greet: Oh, there you are! How are you?
talk: How about applying for the Guardian Knights?
You look as trustworthy as ever.
Sometimes, the mouthguard of my helmet feels like it's trying to suffocate me. Hahaha!!
recruit.gift: Normally, I wouldn't accept - but I shall accept it as your sincerity.

affinity.greet: Ha ha! The Guardian Knights also need to rest. Come, take a seat here.
talk: I didn't expect Kasel to get that strong. He used to cry and follow me everywhere... And now he's the master of the Holy Sword... Ha ha.
Am I jealous of Kasel? No way! He's my brother, and I'm proud of him.
affinity.gift: All this... I'm flattered. I'll have to work even harder.

relationship.greet: Hahaha, good to see you again!
talk: My justice isn't really anything too fancy. A belief that I will never be ashamed of - that is my justice.
A high-ranking position doesn't mean you can get a lot done. It might get you stuck in the castle with all the paperwork.
I know I need to help that person, but right now, there are more pressing matters - the people suffering all across Orvelia.

These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

name: Rephy
subtitle: Spiritual Guide
description: Half-human and half-animal, this creature guides souls using a spirit lamp. Heals allies with the power of souls. Disturbs enemies or recovers Mana of allies with the help of souls as well.
story: This pure and kindhearted Tamian soul guide can communicate with the dead. The Tamian race lives in harmony with nature, and they have the ability to read its flow and guide the souls of the dead. Rephy's ability as a soul guide is exceptional, even for a Tamian. He uses it to guide the souls of those who died in the forest and help them pass on, preventing them from turning evil. He is the most capable among the Tamians in discerning the paths of the stars, pacifying the souls of the dead, and properly guiding them to the afterlife.

inn.idle: Have you heard of the Tamian tribe?

recruit.greet: I'm Rephy, sage of the Tamian tribe.
talk: Human, come with me. Let's go, defeat the evil king and protect the forest.
You never get lost in this forest with me!
It is one of our tasks to guide those who died in the forest, helping them return to where they must..
recruit.gift: I got a gift from a human! Hooray!

affinity.greet: It's warm! The souls will like this place!
talk: Can you hear that? The stars outside the window are whispering to us!
Human, I'll invite you to our forest next time!
affinity.gift: A surprise gift? Humans really are good friends!

relationship.greet: Hi! Your soul is as pure as usual!
talk: The forest feels good! Clear air, refreshing winds, dancing fairies...
Leave the guiding to me! The souls will help us!
The stars say, today will be a good day! Let's go out!

uw.story: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

name: Dimael
subtitle: Shadow Hunter
description: A Dark Elf who hunts enemies in the shadows. His vengeful crossbow pierces his enemies with pitch-black darkness.
story: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.
dislike: His fellow kinsmen who let his sister die

inn.idle: Ephigael...

recruit.greet: Ah..it's you.
talk: Stop staring.
Bothersome. Leave me be.
...Get to the point.
recruit.gift: ...For me? Hmph, why not. No point in letting it go to waste.

affinity.greet: This place isn't so bad.
talk: I like shaded areas. I hate the glaring brightness.
Darkness is my primal source of my power.
affinity.gift: Why do you keep giving me these things? I hate dealing with troublesome things like this.

relationship.greet: So, you're here. Find anything useful?
talk: When is the next hunt? I do hope it is as fruitful as the last.
This dark power is mine now. I shall continue to wield it as I see fit.
My revenge isn't truly over...but at least for the time being, I feel at ease.

Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

name: Reina
subtitle: Lightning Flash
description: A mercenary who wields a light, one-handed sword. Dodges attacks with nimble movements and pierces the enemy with the sharp end of her sword.
story: Reina von Stein was born the daughter of a noble family of the empire. Her free spirit and energetic personality seem to brighten up even those around her. She prefers a life of freedom as a mercenary over the suffocating life of an aristocrat. After working as a mercenary for a long time, and she's already lost all traces of her noble upbringing in her manners. Even as a child, she showed a natural talent with swords. Over the years, she developed her skills with a rapier, using a style that best suited her lithe physique. Recently, she turned down a strange contract. Ever since then, she has been feeling as if someone has been following and watching her.

inn.idle: A good job offer! Ah, but the employer is a bit...

recruit.greet: Whoa, handsome...Ah, hello!
talk: Need a mercenary? I'm one of the best.
Wow, such a cutie...oh, it's nothing, hehe...
Looking for Reina, the Lightning Flash? Hehe, yep, that's me!
recruit.gift: Eh? A present? Hehe, thanks. I'll give you a discount on the next job.

affinity.greet: Eek, this place is amazing!
talk: Do you have any clients to introduce me to? Someone good-looking if possible!!!
I don't like boring work! Heh heh!
affinity.gift: Wow! For me? Really? Heh heh, you're the best!

relationship.greet: Hey there, good looking! It's been a while!
talk: People these days! They think I'm some kind of pervert, but that's a misunderstanding! I just like men's bodies!
At times, I grow reminiscent of the better life. You know, like in moments where it's raining outside and you have to sleep in the mud.
Even while working as a mercenary, sometimes the jobs are't quite savory. It makes me think...about this and that...

Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatas, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

name: Pavel
subtitle: Wizard of Ice Dragon
description: A wizard capable of using the Ice Dragon's magic powers after being cursed. He uses powerful icebound magic to freeze enemies.
story: A curious case of a human wizard possessed by the soul of an ice dragon. Having fought alongside Kyle 100 years ago, this ancient ice wizard has actually existed far before even then. The dragon's soul is usually asleep, but wakes up occasionally to speak to him in the voice of a lover. The empire considers him a key figure, and has dispatched Rodina to monitor and protect him. He himself, however, only wishes to live in peace and quiet, away from the concerns of the world.

inn.idle: ...So many people.

recruit.greet: ...Do you need something?
talk: So loud...
...I need to cool my head a bit.
What would Master have done...
recruit.gift: ..I accept.

affinity.greet: Why is this place so warm...?
talk: Be quiet... Let me rest now...
I can't feel any coldness from you...
affinity.gift: ....Thank you.

relationship.greet: ...You look well.
talk: I was originally human...so I can understand.
Are you curious about dragons...?
Her soul whispers to me...she is curious about you...

uw.story: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

name: Demia
subtitle: Fortress of Steel
description: This guardian knight carries a gigantic lance and shield. Endures the attack of enemies with absolute fortitude and disturbs enemy lines with her lance.
story: Ziltrion Si Demia. The commander of the Guardian Knights of Orvel. She is a mighty and dignified knight who wields a lance and a giant shield. It is said that penetrating her shield is next to impossible. As a knight commander, she cherishes her subordinates, and is prepared to perform any task in service of her land. Having felt the recent change of the atmosphere within the royal palace, she hopes to quickly appoint Clause as the next commander so that she may protect Scarlet from the aggression of the nobles.

inn.idle: Make yourself fully prepared for the battle tomorrow.

recruit.greet: Nice to meet you, soldiers. I am Demia Ziltrion, head of the Royal Garrison.
talk: The royal garrison is strong. Nars Horrun will lead the troops in replacement of myself.
My father has spent years as the head of garrison, too. He wanted me to grow up as a normal child, but his blood runs through my vein.
I will defeat the Evil King and bring peace back to the realm.
recruit.gift: I should share this with my soldiers.

affinity.greet: Thank you for inviting me.
talk: Please let me know if you find out anything about the Dark Legion.
We are ready to fight anytime. For Orvelia!
affinity.gift: I'll share this with the soldiers.

relationship.greet: I hear you have been looking for me. What is it?
talk: I worry about the princess. She's still young and gentle...it must be hard.
Hmph, why can't that tin can stay around and protect the princess...such a bothersome man...
Me? Um, well...going out to battle alongside you isn't all that bad. It is good exercise.

uw.story: One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than diamond.

Demia's mother is worried about her daughter, who decided to be the shield of Orvelia. Whenever Demia marches to the battlefield, she prays to this chest for her daughter's safe return.

Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her vow to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

name: Naila
subtitle: Wind's Fighter
description: A harpy that specializes in melee combat using her knuckles. Quickly moves between the enemy, wreaking havoc upon them. Smashes enemies by launching powerful consecutive attacks.
story: A stout and honorable warrior of the Harpies, the wielders of the power of wind. Her dignity as a Harpy warrior is more important to her than anything else in the world. She draws upon her willpower and desire to uphold her warrior's honor to bring down any enemy. Her skills are exceptional, even among her peers, and she is the ideal role model for younger Harpy warriors.
like: Fellow kinsmen, those who possess a warrior's pride

inn.idle: What is the matter, human warrior?

recruit.greet: I want to spar with you one day.
talk: Himmullis...
It is an absurd thing to think that a borrowed power is one's own.
I never forget the pride of Elidora harpies.
recruit.gift: You sure know what harpies like.

affinity.greet: So, this is what a human's house looks like.
talk: My sister always told me to remember the pride of a Harpy.
I will become the best Harpy warrior in the world.
affinity.gift: I'll pay you back.

relationship.greet: How are you doing? Did you continue your training?
talk: A true warrior never stops developing their skills!
Honor, pride - some may call them useless, but they are important to me.
Next time, let's spar, one on one. Alright?

uw.story: A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of the average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing the wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break into the mind of the wearer, slowing eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.

Time passed, and now it's divided into several fragments, but the gust inside has not died out. Harpies consider it to be divine and call it the Soul of Gust.

name: Rodina
subtitle: Blizard's Sniper
description: She is a sniper from an empire located in an extremely cold environment. She aims calmly no matter the circumstance. The more she focuses, the more powerful she becomes.
story: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.
like: Bears, polar bears, grizzly bears, small bears, large bears
dislike: Those who do not value live

inn.idle: Preparations for the next journey ~hmhmhm~ (humming)

It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

subtitle: Devil's Flame

Currently, for some unknown reason, she is following the witch Maria and assisting her work. Many find it strange that the former champion of the Demon Army, who slaughtered countless enemies and even devoured dragons, now works for a mere witch as her servant. Nevertheless, she continues to faithfully serve her master.

Using lava infused with the power of the volcanic fire, he forged a shield and a sword capable of incinerating anything. During the war against Demons, Temeraire presented these to a human warrior. Unfortunately, the warrior is said to have been defeated by Morrah. No one has seen this legendary gear since then. That is, until Morrah reappeared on the front line.

The beast smelt a sealing stone from Morrah, lost control, emerged from the lava, and dashed directly to her. Morrah, however, did not hesitate to stab its eyes with Carprain, and a completely different type of heat shriveled Belzebuna and absorbed its body. Looking at its entire body being crushed and the last eye wriggling on the ground, Morrah stuck it on her shield to mock the beast.

subtitle: Holy Ruffian
description: A freewheeling priest from the Order of Lua. He uses a holy explosion to protect the party, which heals allies and damages enemies at once.
story: As the most unlikely priest in the Church of Lua, Baudouin is, in a word, a maverick. Since childhood, he has always been a black sheep in the Church of Lua that emphasizes piety. He entered the church with the help of the High Priest Berman, but the religious life was painfully ill-suited for him. One day, however, he suddenly decided to quit his deviant ways, and started following the path of the high priesthood.

There's one thing I want to say to you. Enjoy life while you can! You know, life is short! You don't want to regret anything!

According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself. Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving a revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

The original journal is kept by Baudouin in safekeeping, reminding him of his teacher's will.

name: Jane
subtitle: Alabaster Corpse
description: This girl has become an undead after fighting the Dark Legion in the past. She drags along the coffin that she sleeps in. She recovers herself by leaving a mark of death on her enemies.
story: She was once the princess of the fallen Republic of Gray. The Republic of Gray, wiped off the map by the Demon invaders during the Demon War, was the protector of countless secrets, including the ruins and technologies of an ancient civilization. Jane, too, lost her life to protect those secrets. Later, she was brought back to the world as an undead by Malduk, a high-ranking officer and a strategist of the Demon Army. She was given a new consciousness by a strange, dark magic. Now, she seeks to go on a journey to find her past self and her lost memories.

She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you.'

description: A noble lady hailing from Orvelia. A genius who attained the title of ‘Violet’ from the Tower of the Sage. Using her fancy parasol, she fires powerful energy cannons towards the enemy.
story: A daughter of a noble family from Orvel. As one of the most talented wizards in the Tower of Sage, she has been granted the title of 'Purple' in recognition of her magic capability. She was raised in the Tower of Sage since childhood at her parents' request, but she still retains her dignity as an aristocrat. As a child, she never realized why her parents sent her away on her own, but now she understands their reasons. Now, she is back home, and is always attended by her handmaiden, who is like another member of the family to her.

inn.idle: Hmph, may as well just buy this entire Inn.

recruit.greet: Is it your first time meeting nobility?
talk: Hmm, what family are you from?
This skirt...the last touches were quite shabby.
Ugh, I prefer my chef's cooking to this...peasant food.
recruit.gift: My, thank you. Why not come over for tea sometime?

affinity.greet: This house isn't that nice.
talk: Ugh... I don't need food. I don't think I'll like it.
I'll bring a luxurious car next time I come.
affinity.gift: Thank you. Let me know if you want anything.

relationship.greet: Sister went out for a while, so do not worry.
talk: Do not be mislead by the smiles of nobles. Their smiles are but mere masks to hide themselves with.
I do not like the fact that I cannot call Priscilla 'Sister' at home. She's just like family!
The title of Violet...there is no hiearchy between The Seven, but I dislike being the last color of the spectrum!

Annette gladly agreed to take on this new project. Soon after, she created Mahitra, a beautiful umbrella befitting an aristocratic wizard of noble destiny.

name: Leo
subtitle: Eternal Scribe
description: The Scribe of the Royal Great Library of Orvelia. Using runes, he heals allies and erases beneficial magic from foes.
story: In the royal palace of Orvel, there exists a library that is said to be infinite in space. Leo is a Gnome who has been protecting this library for a very long time. Having memorized every book in the library, he is the most knowledgeable person in the entire palace, and many visit the library, seeking his wisdom. However, he still seems to have difficulty interacting with others.

inn.idle: Wow, there are more people than there are books here.

recruit.greet: Hello. Nice to meet you.
talk: I want to know everything about this world.
The world sure is big...
Come to the library sometime. I'll introduce you to some nice books.
recruit.gift: For me? Really?

affinity.greet: Oh, it's so cozy!
talk: You don't have that many books! Should I bring you some from my house?
You can learn anything from books!
affinity.gift: Thank you! I'll invite you to our house sometime!

relationship.greet: Hello. What's today's news?
talk: I wrote in a lot of new entries today. Every day brings new knowledge.
There seems to be a lot of fun things outside. Maybe I should go out a bit more...
Do you have a minute? I brought a new book...

name: Fluss
subtitle: Fluttering Blade
description: The vice-captain of the Imperial Guard. His sonic blade cuts through even magic. He is capable of attacking the most dangerous foes first.
story: As the son of the commander of the Imperial Knights, he has received rigorous training since early childhood to become a proper swordsman. No one can question his title as the fastest swordsman in the imperial palace. The number of enemy knights he felled in the fields of battle is a testament to his skills. He quickly rose to the rank as the vice-captain of the Imperial Guard and is the subject of everyone's admiration. Although he is aware of his beautiful appearance, he detests those who approach him for his outer beauty. He considers inner beauty more important than what is visible. However, he's slightly hypocritical in that he occasionally falls for his own beauty.
dislike: Those who do not understand romance

inn.idle: Not too different from the Inns back at the Empire, I warrant.

recruit.greet: Quite the hard-worker, you are.
talk: Ah, the cool breeze of the Empire - how I miss it so.
Constant training is the way to improve your skills.
There is only one other person with whom I could speak so freely...
recruit.gift: A toast to your spirit.

affinity.greet: I brought some flowers since you invited me.
talk: People are like swords. You have to continue to cultivate yourself to become a true knight.
I really don't like Pavel. To leave Rodina like that...
affinity.gift: Cheers to your kindness.

relationship.greet: A toast to your...no, I'll stop right there.
talk: My house wasn't originally part of the Empire.
This flower is an offering to my ancestor's homeland. It is a symbol, a memoir to remember their fallen homeland.
Our Order is just a front, mostly comprised of inexperienced children from noble families. The truly fearful warriors are elsewhere...

They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.

name: Luna
subtitle: Child of Moonlight
description: An unidentified child wielding a slingshot as big as her body. Her projectiles gain strength the further they fly.
story: Lulus, very rarely sighted and often considered mythical, are a race of animal hybrids. They live in an extremely cold region, and are very fearful of contacting the outside world. One day, a Lulu child was born with the exact opposite personality that is typical her race. That child is Luna. It's not that she was unhappy with the ways of her people. Nor did she have any grand purpose of experiencing the world outside. She was simply picking flowers, one step at a time. Another step to pick up some frozen branches for her slingshot. And another step to follow the scent of some sweet, red fruit. Before she knew it, she was outside, running toward a carrot field away from the mountain.

inn.idle: Hi! Do you have any carrots?!

recruit.greet: Hello! Hello to you too! Hello everyone!

Rabbit? Nah, Luna is Luna!
recruit.gift: Yay, carrots!! Wait? These aren't carrots!!

affinity.greet: Hello! Luna is here again!
talk: This place is fun! Luna likes it a lot! Very much!
Luna will give you a blessing! With carrots!
affinity.gift: This is a real carrot, right?

relationship.greet: Luna is doing well!
talk: Luna has lots of friends back home! But Luna doesn't remember where home is!
Everyone thinks Luna's favorite thing is carrots! And yes, that is correct~!
Ah, um...do you have a carrot?

name: Laias
subtitle: Holy Priestess of Water
description: A priestess that guards the Oasis of the Aegina Desert. A Water Dragon that has lived for eons. Her water holds powerful healing properties.
story: This beautiful and gentle priestess of water is actually a morphed blue dragon. In the distant past, she was worshipped by certain desert tribes. However, she has been sleeping for ages for some unknown reason. She can command water to turn lands fertile, and she always used her powers to help her people. In return, the humans built the golden Shrine of Flow in her honor under the lake in the oasis. A flow of evil energy in the desert has awakened her from her sleep, and she has once again begun using her powers to help those around her.
dislike: Anything that disrupts the world's order

inn.idle: Do not be afraid. Ye may be much stronger.

recruit.greet: I'm Lorraine, an Elidora Elf. Salutations.
talk: I had a good time.
May the blessing of mother nature light thy way.
Human beings are astounding creatures, but you have a serious weakness. You are ruled by greed and cannot resist temptation.
recruit.gift: I will treasure this.

affinity.greet: I always welcome the chance to spend time with you.
talk: A major crossroad awaits you. Light and shadow... will converge into one path...
Unlike Elves, who are known for their longevity, humans live shorter lives, but they shine brighter in their prime.
affinity.gift: I'll consider it as a gift given out of your generosity.

relationship.greet: You have grown strong, just, and pure.
talk: You seem to have the purest soul I've seen in a while.
It would be nice if these times of peaceful enjoyment could last forever...but that would be a vice.
I will never forget you. Not as the Sage, but as a simple elf.

uw.story: An ankh crafted in the shape of a phoenix. It symbolizes the natural cycle of life. In the ancient days, the nomads of the desert worshipped the blue dragon of the oasis as their protector. In return, she blessed them with rain and gave life to their crops. To show their gratitude, the nomads offered her various treasures, including Lazulia, the gem of water. Although she had no particular interest in material wealth, she accepted their gratitude, and used the treasures to build a temple within the oasis. This ankh is the sacred symbol of the temple, and contains the mighty power of water.

When she woke up in the Shrine of Flow by the earnest prayers of Trovatia tribe, she came to think that young Lilia would not be able to protect the children of desert safely if she falls asleep again like she did 100 years ago. After contemplation, she stored her power in the scale so that she could give it to Lilia if anything happens.

name: Arch
subtitle: Arrow of Purity
description: A high-ranking angel that descended upon this world to punish the chaos-inciting Demons. Soaring through the sky, his arrows rain judgment upon evildoers.
story: An Angel warrior who descended from the Heavens to punish the Demons and stop the spread of chaos on earth. His delegated tasks include scouting, reconnaissance, and execution of any Demons found on earth. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is quick and decisive against any injustice. He truly loves Mankind and all the life forms that inhabit the earth. This is why he strives to prevent the Demons from defiling this world.

inn.idle: Hm?! I think I just saw a demon...

recruit.greet: Greetings, earth dwellers.
talk: Are my wings that interesting?
Smiting evil is my call.
May you see that your very lives are blessed by the goddess.
recruit.gift: May the light guide your way.

affinity.greet: It's good to see you, follower of the light.
talk: The fate of the world is in your hands.
You, who received the blessing of the goddess, what will you do with that power?
affinity.gift: I don't know how I'll use it, but thank you.

relationship.greet: May the light be with you, my friend.
talk: Demons... they are scum that must be executed, but the few that help us... I do not know what to do with them.
Your existence is like a bright beacon. Keep your soul pure, my friend.
I once thought that your kind were weak. But now, I have learned that strength comes in many forms.

name: Lewisia
subtitle: The Royal Vermilion Blood
description: A vampire princess who fought alongside the heroes from 100 years ago. A pure-blooded immortal vampire, she is currently recovering from her past battles. She wields dominion over all blood, utilizing her minions to attack the enemy.
story: A Vampire princess who joined Kyle in his war against the Demons 100 years ago. She is a pure-blood Vampire who has lived for over 500 years. Often considered the Queen of Vampires, she is nigh immortal. The tremendous expenditure of her power during the war against the Demons has taken its toll, and the immortal princess now assumes a child-like form. After the war, she blended into Human society and watched the world change over the next 100 years while slowly restoring her power. When the Demons reappeared and the Holy Sword awoke, Lewisia sensed the sudden shifts of energy. Soon after, she left on a journey to find and observe the newly chosen warrior.

inn.idle: How energetic. Perfect for recuperation.

recruit.greet: Greetings, we meet again. Are you staying for a while?
talk: Hm? I admit that garlic is rather spicy, but why do you ask?
I love the bright sunshine here. Back at home, it is always so dark....Hmm? Why are you looking at me that way?
Once I recover, I will not be inconvenienced with such a body anymore.
recruit.gift: Presents, hmm. An interesting custom. Well, if you insist, I will accept your gift.

affinity.greet: Hm, it's a great day.
talk: My status as a princess? Hm... I've never really thought about it.
This place is much better than the dark and damp place where I'm from.
affinity.gift: A gift? Thank you. I'll have to prepare something for you next time.

relationship.greet: Hello. Isn't it quite nice out today?
talk: My body is recovering quickly nowadays. It's all thanks to you.
Why do I sometimes revert to my younger forms even when I'm getting better? Well, I get bored...and people give me snacks.
I like this place because it's comfortable... so i plan to stay a bit longer, by your side.

This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

When Lewisia was born, the previous Ruler passed the ring to her on the spot, proclaiming the birth of the new Ruler. The perpetual smile on his face seems to come from the wisdom of someone who sees through the entire universe. He shows great interest in those with special abilities and enjoys testing them. His space teleportation ability seems to surpass the realm of mortals, and he can even travel across dimensions. It is unsure what his true motivation is, but it seems certain enough that he always intends to help others.

description: A genius technomagi hoping for the day everyone gains access to magic. Her technomagical golem acts as her weapon, blasting the enemy away.
story: A genius technomagi from the Kingdom of Orvelia. She is highly optimistic, and failure never seems to bother her. She dreams of inventing a device that would allow anyone to handle magic one day. She has a magically engineered assistant whom she brought to life after years of research. Following the arrival of the Demons, she incorporated her research into developing weapons that would allow anyone to fight against the invaders.
dislike: People who look down on Technomagic

inn.idle: Wow, people everywhere! Very different from my lab at the castle!

recruit.greet: Hello~ Does technomagic interest you?

The royal palace does give me a lot of research funding...but it's still lacking!
Huh? These eggs look kinda like my cutie here!
recruit.gift: Hehe! Thanks for the donation to the research funds!

1 cutie for each person! How's it?
affinity.gift: Heh heh, I'll get lots of funds...!

I've gotten a raise on my research fees! Thanks to that, I can do much more in my laboratory!
I want to share my cuties with everyone!

As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.

Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

name: Mitra
subtitle: The Silver Battle Wolf
description: He is also called the Song of Silver Madness. A tactless man to the point of surprise, without any sense of responsibility. However, once the battle begins, he becomes an untouchable Silver Wolf, churning the battlefield into a zone of carnage.
story: Known to some as the Song of the Silver Madness, he is incredibly insincere in everything he does. He shows absolutely no sense of responsibility in regard to those around him. Once he engages in a combat, though, he turns into an untouchable silver wolf that storms across the battlefield. Nothing is known about his past. One thing is certain: he does not distinguish between friend and foe once the madness of battle takes over him. Staying near him when he's in this state may be far more dangerous than holding onto a ticking time bomb.
like: Battle, exciting fights, the smell of gunpowder

inn.idle: Haah....I just wanna go take a nap.

recruit.greet: Yo~
talk: Hey, did a fight happen somewhere?
Bleh, I don't wanna do anything right now.
Sometimes, I just wanna let loose.
recruit.gift: Whoa?! This is amazing!

affinity.greet: Oh, it's a great day for shooting.
talk: Things were good back then. That old guy may be strict, but he sure takes good care of his men. So when he left the army... I quit, too! Hahaha!
Oh, I wonder what the old man is doing.
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you.

relationship.greet: Oh, you're still alive! Hahaha!
talk: These guns of mine make me feel good. They're also kind of messed up...like me!
Kahaha! You know, these bastards whisper to me sometimes, eh. Pull the trigger, pull it, pull it~!!! Or so they say~
There's apparently a scary bounty hunter and former Imperial Navy on your tail. What does that feel like, eh? Hehehe...

It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

Hot-tempered Mitra used to complain that he wanted to shoot his enemies faster with Velkinoth's crazy rate of fire, but its slow reload speed kept getting in the way. One day, when Mitra was complaining as he always had been, Crow suddenly appeared in front of him. - Oh? Old... Kugh! Crow punched Mitra in the stomach, threw something at him, then went away. - Use that and stop complaining. Is this just his unique way of showing he cares?

With the cutting-edge technology of Magos Le'Flamme, it was made solely to be loaded to Velkinoth. As its ingredients were very rare, making a single bullet took a long time. Valance decided to call it the Song of Madness, a name that fits the madness that Mitra shows in the battlefield.

name: Ricardo
subtitle: Lua's Judgment
description: A noble hero who has guarded the realm of humans from the threat of the Demons for a long time. Utilizing a pillar blessed by the goddess, he crushes his enemies.
story: A hero who saved countless lives from the Demons, and the current commander of the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua. This brave and seasoned knight has been hunting down Demons all across Orvelia since his younger days. He is also the headmaster of the orphanage where Kasel, Frey, and Clause grew up. He trained countless warriors in Orvelia and is considered their spiritual leader. He is preparing to step down from the position due to his age, but his age-defying strength has always led to the denial of his retirement request.
dislike: Demons, especially those who attack people for no reason

inn.idle: I see you're all healthy. Good! Hahahaha!!

recruit.greet: Hahaha, it's you, eh? Have you been eating well?
talk: I may be old, but I'm still perfectly fine! Although, I can't tell when I'll be able to retire at this rate. Hahaha!!
Hahaha, my hips ache a bit, but eh, whatever. I can still go on!
Arm wrestling competition!? There's no way I'm missing this. Bring it on!!
recruit.gift: Haha, don't mind me. Just put it in the donation box for the orphanage! The kids will need that more than I do.

affinity.greet: How are you? Health is the most important thing!
talk: It looks like you've been training hard! Kwahahaha!!!
Liquor? I love it! Though, I can't drink as much as I used to!

story: An assassin of the Laughing Mask, and Roi's colleague. Although she has a physical advantage over Roi as a Half-Elf, she lacks his worldly wisdom and his ability to connect with others, traits that made him crucial in large-scale operations. This has given her something of an inferiority complex. As the 'Cleaner' of the organization, she was tasked with eliminating any traitors. When Roi abandoned the organization, she set out to chase him to figure out his motivation, leaving all her other tasks behind. Her plans after finding him remain to be seen.

uw.story: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.

After watching Tanya flawlessly accomplish countless missions, the leader decided that Tanya was the right one to be sent to the most dangerous of missions and had this secret weapon of Laughing Mask, 'Needle of Silence' delivered to her. Made with advanced biotechnology, it causes the energy flowing inside the body to regurgitate, killing the opponent in the blink of an eye. Most importantly, it is something that would help Tanya to keep the vow of silence when things go wrong and the mission is compromised.

description: A mixed-blood between high-rank demon and human, Ezekiel is damned to curse his own existence. Slashes his powerful demonic right arm to tear apart his enemies.
story: The son of Lucikiel is a powerful Demon officer who brought down the Republic of Gray. Usually considerate and careful, he is actually half Human. In battle, his Demon blood takes over, turning him arrogant and violent. He inherited this power from his father, whom he never even knew. However, he takes pride in his power and does not try to hide it. Since he is only partly Demon, only a single arm undergoes the transformation. However, even just this single arm contains immense power, and it's certainly not easy for him to fully control it yet. If he loses the control of the arm, the only wise decision is to immediately get as far away from him as possible.
dislike: Weaklings who act tough, idiots who think they know everything

At other times, he is an immensely powerful and arrogant Demon, just like his father. Barbatos, Jailer of Despair, manifests itself when Ezekiel's Demon blood is in full power. ut.story: A bond containing the mana of an unknown priest. Young Ezekiel used to go berserk frequently. If anyone insulted his mom, he would allow his boiling demon blood to take over. Once he return to his senses, he would stare at his wounded arm and his terrified mom. When he was older, Ezekiel was getting rid of demons when he got into an argument with a bigger priest of Lua. He went berserk, just like any other day. Ezekiel was alone when he came to, and he was taken aback by the bond on his cursed arm. When he tried to take it off, he found that the priest's magic couldn't be shaken off so easily. However, he stopped going berserk and losing his consciousness after that. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

name: Theo
subtitle: Knight of Loyalty
description: The 1st Knight of the long lost Republic of Gray, who wanders the world in search of his long lost liege, Jane. His dual spears hold a dangerous power, lying in wait to pierce enemy demons mercilessly.
story: A knight who served the Republic of Gray 100 years ago, and an admirer of Jane Gray. Theo was the First Knight of the Republic and the wielder of the Lightning Legios. During the Duchy's battle against the Demon Army, the Mountain Fortress went on a rampage when its seal was lifted. Under Jane's order, Theo set out to contain it. In his absence, powerful Demon officers attacked the royal palace. Theo returned to fight them despite heavy injury, but was unable to defeat them by himself. When the battle was over, he held the body of the princess in his arms and cried out from the ruins of the palace. Suddenly, a mysterious entity offered him a chance to defend his princess for all eternity. When he accepted, he fell into a deep slumber.

inn.idle: I am Theo Phil Grayum of the Gray Republic.

recruit.greet: Oh, it's you. We've met before, have we not?
talk: I wish to see her once more.
...More than a hundred winters have passed.
Have you, by any chance, seen a beautiful white-haired lady?
recruit.gift: Your heart is filled with warmth.

affinity.greet: Hello.
talk: Not all demons are evil... Like that cat, you know.
I've used a spear ever since I was young. I'm used to wielding a spear.
affinity.gift: Thank you. My heart is warming up.

relationship.greet: How are you? It has been a while.
talk: It was the first time I felt so warm inside...as if the Sun was standing just before my eyes.
A lot of people ask me - why go so far? I say...I have merely been living the way my heart tells me to.
If she doesn't recognize me when we finally meet...I do not know what expression I should make...

uw.story: A spear said to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.

name: Mediana
subtitle: The Dangerous Doctor
description: A doctor whose technique originates from eras with scarce numbers of Priests and Healing Magic. She fires medicine from her large needle to empower allies, or weaken the enemy.
story: A practitioner of the medical arts developed when priests were short in supply. She inherited her natural medical talent from her father, but her thirst for knowledge crossed the line when she began researching poison. As a result, she was excommunicated from medical society, but her enthusiasm for research was seemingly unaffected. However, her basic respect for life kept her from achieving any experimental results for her poison research. When the Demons appeared, she became overjoyed at finding rare and precious test subjects.

inn.idle: Fufufu, finally, a worthy test subject has appeared.

recruit.greet: Welcome. Have we met before?

Just a second, I just thought of an extremely effective compound of medicine.
recruit.gift: Oh, thank you. May I use this as research material?

affinity.greet: Hello. I came to rest, so this is good.

One day, I believe that medicine and treatment will do better than healing magic.
You are not my test subject, you are more like...the final recipient. Ah, not for poisons. I meant that as a doctor.

Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her: 'Look at the size of that thing. Shouldn't you at least give it a name?' To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly: 'Oh... Just call it... Piston.'

name: Oddy
subtitle: Clocksmith of Eternal Life
description: A clocksmith that was cursed by the divine animals called the Redpur. His magical clock attacks and petrifies enemies and also allows his allies to use abilites faster.
story: He was a mechanic of the royal palace of Orvelia in the distant past. However, he was cursed by the mythical creature Redpur and turned into a Redpur himself. Ever since the transformation, he has been living for so long that he forgot his own age. When he was Human, he invented the first portable watch, but no one in Orvelia saw its true value. To give his invention the recognition it deserved, he set out to the empire. On his way, he was cursed by a group of Redpurs who mistook him for a poacher. The curse also affected his watch, giving it a magical power to control the time flow within a living body. Oddy's own time stopped as well.

inn.idle: Haha~!! Orvelia sure has changed.

recruit.greet: Greetings, greetings.
talk: Hmm, there's enough time. Shall we talk for a bit?
I used to be a human once...but now I'm a Redpur.

recruit.gift: Oho~it's been a while since I received such human-like presents!

affinity.greet: Hmm? Oh, you're here.
talk: You don't have time? Ha ha, then just make time.
You've never seen a Redpur before? Not surprised. They're always hiding!
affinity.gift: A gift? Hm, I'll have to prepare something next time.

relationship.greet: Welcome, welcome!
talk: Ah, I miss my Redpur friends...
I don't really remember my days as a human. It has been so long.
I thought I was the first to invent the pocket watch, but apparently ancient civilizations were far more advanced than I expected.

He named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana,' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown.'

The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it is said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.

The design was perfect, but he did not have the right catalyst container for his powerful Clock Magic. No metal on earth would endure the heat for a single tick of the clock. When he was agonizing over his plan, he remembered something: there was a space stone that Nyx gave him for display. He ground it to make a clockwork out of it, and the result was perfect.

name: Viska
subtitle: Demon Eater
description: A rogue demon, aiming to devour other demons to raise her own power. She traveled across the rift between dimensions to hunt down the powerful demons currently residing in the Material World. Her spikes exist to rip and tear through enemies.
story: A maverick among Demons who seeks to grow her own power by devouring other powerful Demons. She embodies the worst possible meaning of the word Demon. She crossed the dimensional rift to seek out and devour the Demons who traveled to the earthly realm. She placed a limit on her own power and assumed the form of a sickly young girl to further humiliate her victims. She detests weaklings who pretend to be strong. On the other hand, she respects those who recognize their own weaknesses and risk their lives in the pursuit of strength.
like: Fighting powerful demons and devouring them afterward

inn.idle: Eh...no Demons? I feel hungry...

recruit.greet: Hello~Any snacks? Any Demons?

Feeling a bit peckish...Hey, do you know of any Demons in the nearby area that seem strong?
This? It's the Mark of a Demon Contract. Well, I don't know the specifics.
recruit.gift: What's this? Can I eat it?

affinity.greet: Oh, I think I smell something delicious?
talk: I'm hungry... Do you have anything good to eat? Nothing? Really?
Demon souls are the best, but regular food is pretty good, too!
affinity.gift: Something good! Something good!

talk: Me? Well, I'm just a normal village girl...who is posessed by a Demon. Nothing more, nothing less.
My form during battles? Ah, that's Viska, the Demon inside me. Normally, she lets me control my body, but when we fight...
I don't feel anything about eating Demons. In fact, they rather deserve it... and well, the two of us are now one...

This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.

When she couldn't find anything nice to eat around her, she came up with a brilliant idea. She thought that taking the dreams out of the Nightmare Jewels that Nightmare Kitrax had and storing her memory of eating delicious prey would allow her to relive those past pleasures. Excited, she imbued the jewel with the memory of eating a delicious demon, and ever since, Viska has been seeking for better-tasting things to put in the jewels.

It was transparent at first, but when Viska touched it, it let out a radiant red light, with a small pattern appearing on the surface. name: Priscilla
subtitle: Maid of Steel
description: Formally one of the highest order of the Orvelian Army, she became the maid of the genius mage, Aisha; the single daughter of the noble Daphnel Pon family. Her powerful halberd cuts down all enemies swiftly.
story: A former officer of Orvelia's armed forces. After a failed attempt to reveal the corruption of military leaders, she was driven out from her position. Wanting to conceal their corruption, the military leaders constantly sent out assassins to eliminate her. The long and lonely fight was beginning to take its toll on her, physically and mentally. One day, the aristocratic von Daphnel family offered her protection in exchange for her service. She accepted, and has been working as Aisha's maid in the Tower of Sage ever since. To this day, she faithfully carries out her duties as a maid bodyguard. However, she sends all her payments to an undisclosed recipient.
like: Comrades in arms, her lady, cute outfits for her lady

recruit.greet: Milady isn't currently at her room.

I'll have to stop by the forge to sharpen my axe.

She was such a small child, trying so hard to be an adult... So, I felt that I had to protect her.
I am satisfied with my current life. My wages are decent enough to let me help with my past subordinates' lives, too.

This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.

name: Yanne
subtitle: Dragon Slayer
description: A Barbarian warrior that travels the lands, hunting down monsters that trouble the people. The Lone Slayer of the Mad Dragon Svelta. Her massive, powerful arrows are capable of piercing through even castle walls.
story: A Barbarian warrior who specializes in dealing with monsters that threaten people. Thanks to a unique physical trait, her muscular strength is several times stronger than that of a normal Barbarian warrior. She wields a greatbow larger than her own body with such ease that people call her a walking siege weapon. While she is a kindhearted woman who enjoys helping others, once engaged in a combat, her Barbarian aggressiveness begins to surface. She once slayed a mad dragon named Svelta, a feat that earned her the nickname Dragon Slayer.
dislike: Monsters that cannot be defeated physically

inn.idle: Ahaha, everyone seems to be having fun?

recruit.greet: It's been a while~ have you been well?
talk: Monster hunting? It's quite fun, but its even better because I can help people in the process.
Monster meat is pretty good when cooked right, you know?
Barbarian Warriors all learn how to cook. Well, I think I'm the best cook though, eh?
recruit.gift: A present? Ahaha, thanks! I'll treat you to a meal next time!

affinity.greet: Long time? How have you been?
talk: The food here is pretty good.
Hm. Maybe next time I'll ask Juno to make me some lunch?
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you! I'll use it well.

talk: Ever tried Dragon meat? It's pretty good. I'll bring some Dragon steak next time!
Work as a monster hunter isn't easy, but it's worth it.
Barbarian warriors are all pretty strong...but my body is pretty special.
