The heart of the Fire Giant was pierced, but strong flames were still blazing in it. There, she found a fist-sized stone. When she took the stone out, the flames died out. Since then, Yanne's arrows have been imbued with flame energy.

name: Zafir
subtitle: Prince of Sandstorms
description: A descendant of the ancient God King. A refined young man who stood up to defend the desert. The sandstorm he summons with his arrow engulfs his enemies, ridding the world of their existence.
story: A Prince and successor to the God King of the ancient desert kingdom who possesses the power to control desert sand. As the young leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors, he has been trained and educated to be the worthy successor to the great king. When the Trovatia tribe, their sworn brothers, were praying at the Shrine of Flow to awake the God Dragon, he led his warriors to defeat all demons approaching the oasis. Assisted by the God Dragon and Laudia, her priestess, he is fulfilling his role as a Desert Warrior defending his home. He hopes that his efforts make the late God King proud.
like: Cats, sand art, people in the desert
dislike: Those who try to harm the people that he cares for

inn.idle: Wow, I've never seen drinks like these.

recruit.greet: May the blessings of the God King be with you.
talk: Umm, this place is very different from the bars in the desert. We don't sit on the floor, do we?
A Desert Warrior puts their people before anything else.
...I don't particularly fancy crowded places, but this carefree atmosphere... I can't say I hate it.
recruit.gift: Such tremendous kindness. Thank you.

affinity.greet: How have you been?
talk: The prophecy says the resurrection of the God King is near.
...If time allows, visit Aegina sometimes. I will be your guide.
affinity.gift: The Desert Warriors will be happy that you are there as well.

relationship.greet: Greetings, my desert friend.
talk: I like cats... No creature comes even close when it comes to elegance.
Even the fierce sand storms in the desert could not leave a scuff on Desert Warriors.
I might have his blood flowing in my veins, but I think I have a long way to go to call myself a worthy successor.

Normally, it's hung on a wall and used in ceremonies, but it's actually one of the best defense weapons used by the royal family. Enemies shot by this arrow face the Judgment of the Desert within a massive sandstorm.

The high priest of the ancient kingdom used this to show the glory of the kingdom to its people in the past. Seeing their city shining in gold, people grew proud of their kingdom.

name: Yuria
subtitle: Mysterious Tailor
description: Being one of the very best tailors around, she makes clothes and dresses for all celebrities across the continent. She reads people's fates and deftly sews with her needle and thread. Stars dance along with her needle and her thread leaves traces of light upon everything it touches.
story: If one asks who the most famous tailor is in Orbis Continent, most people won't know who to name. However, those who know a thing or two about clothing will never fail to bring up Yuria's name. Yuria, a tailor from Penteonia, always has two conditions that she sets when accepting requests. First, the client needs to allow Yuria to spend some time with the client so that she draws inspiration as to what kind of clothing she would make. Second, while she is with the client, the client must not lie or pretend to be something they are not. The first condition is for her sense of 'Foresight.' She needs to feel the client's thread of fate so she can express it through clothing. The second condition is mainly because she can sense the truth and finds lies disgusting. She doesn't want to make anything for anyone who won't be true. Her masterpieces, made with the fate she's read, are as valuable as starlight. Even the nobles would be envious of them.
like: Traveling, her job, warm baths, bard's poems and songs
dislike: People who don't take clothes seriously, people who disrespect other's fates, lies

inn.idle: Ah, it's pretty lively around here! Everyone looks like they're having a good time.

recruit.greet: Oh, hello there, do you need some new clothes?
talk: Just like a painter working on a blank canvas, I too realize what's in my mind in the form of clothing!
I heard there's a famous tailor in this town. I can't wait to meet whoever it is.
People are born with different fates. I'd like to see what path your fate will lead you to.
recruit.gift: Wow, Thank you. I'll make you some clothes in return, sooner or later.

affinity.greet: Haha, good to see you. I feel that our meeting today was predestined.
talk: It's not that I actually have absolute visions of the future. I just sense what lies beyond fate.
I love traveling. You can see, feel, and experience lots of things.
affinity.gift: Wow, this much? I will buy you a drink in return.

relationship.greet: I have been waiting for you, Master of Fate.
talk: I go through a rather unique process while making clothes. That's why it takes me so long to finish one garment.
Umm, it's quite amazing, if you think about it. I didn't start doing this for fame or wealth, but I became famous before I knew it.
Sometimes I go back to my home country, Penteonia. It's mainly to make a dress for Queen Artemia. *Giggle*

The result was this shawl, one that provides temperature adjustment magic to the wearer. With this around her shoulders, storms or blizzards won't stop Yuria from traveling. The only downside is that it emits light even during the night. People who see her from afar mistake her for a fairy or a ghost and get frightened.

So, she always returns to her home at least once a year to make a dress for the queen, and get a few bottles in return.

name: Ophelia
subtitle: Pathfinder of Fate
description: An astrologist of Stardust, a troupe that wanders through the continent. Instead of going on a pilgrimage as a member of the witch's association, searches for the destined soulmate she once encountered in her dreams. Controls the tarot cards floating around her to attack enemies in distance.
story: An astrologer traveling with a wandering troupe called 'Stardust.' As a member of the Witch Association, she is supposed to reside in a designated location and read the flow of fate as part of her practice. However, she is currently traveling in search of a man with a particular destiny she met in a dream. She believes that the man from her clairvoyant dream is destined to become the savior of the world. Her current priority is to find the man, and then stay at his side. If asked about her second goal... She blushes and loses all traces of her usual calmness telling about her future with the man of destiny.

inn.idle: I want to show you the whispers of the stars.

recruit.greet: I am the Witch named Ophelia.
talk: I can see it within your eyes too...the path of the stars.
I look into your eyes, and see...
Have you ever heard the whispers of the stars?
recruit.gift: Thank you! As thanks, I will tell you a bit about your destiny...

affinity.greet: Nice to meet you!
talk: I learned to shuffle cards from a good friend.
I love having a good laugh with people every day.
affinity.gift: I'll tell you your fortune in return.

relationship.greet: Do you want your fortune told? If you do, sit with me!
talk: This child is very special to me. Ah, be careful! You might get burned!
I don't feel bad for straying off the path of my pilgrimage. I am still a witch, and I have pride in my profession.
Ah! This card tells me that my fateful partner is near! Very close too...ah, perhaps...?

Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.

Then, a wizard started searching for it to prevent any more meaningless killing, found it, and sealed it away. No one has seen the card for centuries until Ophelia found it in an old storeroom.

By truly opening her eyes, Ophelia could see the fate of the wider world and sew new fates into its future by using her spirits as a medium. There is usually a thread piece or two left behind whenever a fate is manipulated, and Ophelia would tie the ends of the pieces and watch them magically fuse and form a string as if they were never apart. This spool of thread is the result of her habit.

name: Requina
subtitle: Merchant of Poison
description: A merchant who wanders the continent, selling poison to those in need. Utilizes a blowpipe to poison and disable her enemies.
story: A curious merchant who deals every kind of poison known to mankind. She is a daughter of two wandering alchemists who traveled over from a distant nation. Other merchants call her 'the Merchant of Death,' but she has a different opinion. She claims that no poison is inherently evil, and that how one is used determines its nature. Like a true merchant, she believes that any tool is as good or evil as the one who uses it. Since the reappearance of the Demons, she has been traveling around, searching for the right poison to battle against the invaders.
like: Developing new poisons, those who understand the joy of developing new drugs
dislike: People who are prejudiced against poisons

inn.idle: Hmm, is there nobody that might buy my wares?

recruit.greet: Hello! Is there a poison you might need?

Ah, well, it is true that most poisons are used for bad things.
Hmm, where is that lady that bought my poisons last time?
recruit.gift: Wow, thanks! I'll use this to increase my ware selection!!

This weed hasn't been growing. Should I sell some rare poison instead? What do you think?
affinity.gift: Oh, thank you! I'll let you buy some special Requina-style poison! Heh heh.

relationship.greet: Welcome back~ hahaha, today was a haul!
talk: Doctors, assassins, chemists and alchemists...all of them are my important clients!
Why I use poison darts? Well, they're quiet and easy to use! Well, they wouldn't be quite nice in the wrong hands...but~
Poisons that work on Demons? I'm researching that. I have a few close to perfection...wanna see?

As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

She made the poison, then named it Tear of Mr. Big Snake. The root extract of the Snake Mandrake causes excruciating pain. The agony is actually the gnawing away of the corrupted part of the soul. If one can endure it, their soul can be purified.

name: Aselica
subtitle: Guardian of the Sun
description: As a knight of the righteous heavens, she punishes evil with her sword and protects the weak with her shield. She has descended in order to defeat the Demons who are ruining the earthly realm. Her beautiful sword and shield are wielded to smite enemies and protect her comrades with their light.
story: A powerful angel who defends the haven of angels. Even among the Angels who wield the power of light, she has a special connection to the sun, whose divine light she uses to fight against darkness. She is tasked with the protection of the souls of other angels awaiting resurrection. When the Holy Sword reappeared in the world, she heeded the divine call to join the new protector of the world. She will see to it that no chosen warrior would ever succumb to the darkness again.

inn.idle: So this is where the Hero resides...

recruit.greet: May the Sun's blessing be with you.
talk: I will not lose to mere Demons.
The Sun does not discriminate, and shares its light with all.
Do you know a man named Arch?
recruit.gift: This is of no use to me...but still, thank you.

affinity.greet: Warrior. So, this is your resting place.
talk: The Demons are evil. They must be annihilated, no matter what.
Don't forget that the sun is always shining behind you.
affinity.gift: Humans can be very thoughtful. Anyway, thank you.

relationship.greet: I feel the warmth of the sun from you. Did anything good happen?
talk: So there are Demons attempting to save the world. How odd.
The Sanctuary of the Angels is where we all return to at some point.
I am your Guardian - and thus, I offer up my arms to you.

These are divine relics of protection, created to banish the darkness and fill the world with light. Bestowed only to the most righteous Guardian Knight of the Angels, these relics can instantly incinerate any Demon that faces their light.

name: Crow
subtitle: The Punishing Bullet
description: He was a former naval officer, but is now a bounty hunter and a troubleshooter. He is cynical and doesn't trust people easily. His guns are categorized into three types.
story: Code name: Hound. A bounty hunter known as the hound of hell. It is said that no one can escape from this former Imperial Navy officer once he targets them. The only consolation for criminals is that this man isn’t motivated by their bounties alone. While there are many theories, the most convincing one is that he’s after revenge. There are moments when this cold-hearted man seems to warm up, they say. It's when he pulls out an old pendant, which nobody has actually seen.
like: Candy canes, a pendant safeguarding a memory, the forgotten nagging of a loved one
dislike: Pirates, Gods who have taken everything away from him. And now, tobacco

inn.idle: Don't get in my way.

recruit.greet: What business do you have with me?
talk: I will take only 1 job. Think carefully before you speak.
It's hard to find ammunition around here...
This isn't a cigarette, it's merely candy.
recruit.gift: Hmm, with this money, I can buy new cig...no, I'll just get some more candy.

affinity.greet: Why did you call me? Just tell me what you need.
talk: He was a real headache, even when he was under my command. But I don't think he'd do something like that. That's why I accepted that offer.
Obviously, the others couldn't bear his madness. That's why I took charge.
affinity.gift: Give me candy.

relationship.greet: What business...ah, it's you.
talk: Orvel is a good place. Even the air is different from the Empire.
I thought, as part of the Navy, I would be out at sea for my entire life. In retrospect, going out to sea was the worst decision ever.
I had two people I cared about dearly. I cannot meet them anymore... but yes, haha... they both hated cigarette smoke.

uw.story: It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization MagosLe’Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra... It's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.

He stood still on the road, looking at it for a long time, and went inside the shop. He wound the music box and stood there, listening to the melody silently. - It's the same one. - I said I would buy her a new one, but she just liked this old, worn music box. He murmured quietly, and bought the music box. In his eyes, his wife was playing the music box to her daughter with a big smile on her face.

story: A powerful Demon who used to be one of the officers serving Dark Lord Angmund. She is capable of holding all of the curses in the world. But her real goal isn't the resurrection of the Dark Lord, nor world domination. Everything that happens in the world is a part of a drama, and she thinks of herself as the audience. Her actions are like that of a scriptwriter who revises the scenario, pulling the strings from the shadows and looking forward to how the scenes she's written play out.

subtitle: Lovely Evil Spirit
description: A ghost born from an amalgamation of countless lives that perished unjustly. Despite its origin, Lavril is surprisingly naive and innocent. She siphons the life energy from her enemies using her spectral powers.
story: A very unconventional ghost. Those who see her may think of her as a ghost of an ordinary girl, but she's not a single spectral entity. Rather, she's an amalgamation of countless souls. Filled with tremendous spectral energy, she is powerful enough to make souls tremble and cast curses at her will....That is, if she was an ordinary ghost. Although she's a ghost born from an amalgamation of young souls that died in the Demon War 100 years ago, the souls of children are too pure and innocent to bear any grudge. Lavril, having been born from them, came into being with a pure and kind mind. Nonetheless, she's still a ghost. Her nature won't change. Even though she's currently a kind and poor girl, a child is like a piece of blank paper, in which a single drop of ink can easily change its color. Without any proper guidance, she can be a threat.

But one must keep in mind that this strange ghost is not a nice, harmless being. It pulls mischievous tricks such as laying pointy toys around a sleeping person, throwing a freshly cooked dish to the ground, and tripping passerby. ut.story: It was late at night when Lavril found a tent of a wandering fortune teller. There were strange creatures flying around her, and they were creating a strange atmosphere that made Lavril feel difficult to approach. The fortune teller sensed her presence and welcomed her. - Welcome to Stardust Fortune Teller's Tent. What do you wish to know? Looking at the fortune teller smile, Lavril timidly opened her mouth. - W-we... we want to make a friend. A friend who is different than us... A friend who breathes, who we can touch... Wh-where could we meet a friend like that...? The fortune teller handed her a card, smiling. On the card that the moon was engraved on, there was a powerful creature drawn on the surface. It was the creature that Lavril feared. Lavril tried to put the card down instantly out of visceral fear, But she then felt the creature accepting her touch, as if relieving her anxiety. Lavril was surprised for a moment, but soon felt at ease. Then, the fortune teller put her hands on Lavril's. - You don't have to look far. Aren't we already good friends? Finishing her sentence, the fortune teller started moving cards, one by one, still holding Lavril's hands. The cards were telling things to the fortune teller in silence, as if they wanted to make Lavril's desperate wish come true. Soon, the cards were all laid out in order and the fortune teller opened her mouth, smiling. - These boys and girls seem to like you very much. They are telling me that you're going to meet countless people that you will hold dear. Before long, you will meet the friends that you've been waiting for.

ut.story: On one sunny day, Lavril was wandering around a village timidly, wanting to make some friends. She wanted to go inside the village and make some friends, but the recent memory of being driven away by the priests of Lua kept her from doing so. Just then, she heard a joyful singing near the flowerbeds just outside the village. Curious, she slowly moved toward where the voice was coming from. A girl was singing and playing the harp among the full-blown flowers, and the children, animals, even fairies were dancing to her song. Mesmerized by the scene, she was walking toward the flowerbeds before she knew it. The moment she set her foot in the flowerbeds, fairies and animals started to shriek and hide, and children burst into tears. They were very sensitive to energy, and they felt threatened by Lavril's presence. The girl, however, reacted in a completely different way. She calmed the creatures down, picked a few flowers around her, and handed them to Lavril. Holding the flowers, Lavril gave a blissful smile out of the feeling of acceptance. Then, animals, fairies, and children all started to greet her merrily, having realized Lavril would not harm them.

ut.story: When Lavril came into being, people thought of her as a scary ghost and spread rumors about her. The Church of Lua called in the high priests nearby to take care of her. The Saint of Blessings Lucias and the maverick Baudouin were among the ones that answered the call. Upon hearing about Lavril, the two hurriedly tracked her down and confronted her. As soon as they saw her, they realized that she was not an ordinary ghost, but an amalgamation of child ghosts. It didn't take long before they knew she wasn't a threat. However, the Church had spoken. Ghosts are to be exorcized, and as priests, they were supposed to cleanse her and guide her to where she belonged. But Lucias had a different idea. Lavril was a pure soul that did not deserve an exorcism, and he wanted to let her proceed to the next realm when the time comes, following the law of nature. Lucias took out his handkerchief, wiped the tears off Lavril's face, and showed her the path to the light with the teachings of Lua. This handkerchief reminds her of Lucias, the light that guides her when she is in trouble.

ut.story: Evil Spirits are embodiments of resentment, unable to control themselves due to their overwhelming instincts, driven by negative emotions such as rage and hatred. They are jealous of the living, and openly exhibit aggression to turn the living into new Evil Spirits like them. Lavril, however, is made of the juvenile innocence of children. It is an exception that is too pure to be called an Evil Spirit. A strange entity whose existence seems ironic. It is haunted by loneliness, even when it is full of countless souls. When she was first awakened in this land, she did not know who or what she was. Only pain and suffering dominated her body, and she lacked a clear purpose. The sorrow from the young souls who had met a painful demise began to form tears, and the exploding powers of the souls called out to other Evil Spirits. They say the vast sky was completely darkened when Lavril was born. Having heard her terrible cries, the first to arrive was Spiritual Guide Rephy. Learning about Lavril's plight from other souls, he was able to locate her with help from Oddy and Nyx. Rephy offered her many different gifts to stop her from crying, and this is what caught her eyes the most. This is a type of precious jewel left behind by vengeful Evil Spirits when they are banished. It is the last trace of a unshackled soul who has finally found freedom from evil. This jewel is believed to have soothed Lavril's deep sorrow.

name: Seria
subtitle: Shadow of the Abyss
description: Seria is the 101st heir of the ShadowHilts, a family of hunters that slays non-human, supernatural beings. She came all the way to Orvelia as a vampire hunter, seeking vengeance against her sister who turned into a vampire and slaughtered her comrades. Seria is also trying to save her little sister by putting her out of her misery.
story: The 101st Heir of ShadowHilt and the sister of Erze. People call her cold-blooded for her unfriendly attitude, but she used to be all smiles when she was around her beloved sister, Erze. Seria always felt sorry for her feeble sister and was overprotective of her, without realizing that it was actually putting Erze in greater despair. One day, Erze fell into a trap during a mission. She was saved, but her sickness started to worsen dramatically. Meanwhile, Seria was sent to Windland Snow Mountain to follow the traces of the Vampire Princess. She had a glimpse of what was going on with her sister, but she left for the top-priority mission, praying that she was wrong. However, the tragedy struck the sisters as if it mocking Seria's prayers. - Oh, my beloved sister, Seria! Seria returned to find the corpses of her comrades lying on the ground, cold as ice. Erze welcomed her with two sharp fangs, thirsting for blood. Seria trembled with waves of emotions. Her heart was breaking, yet she spoke in a cold, calm tone. - You... you are not my little sister anymore. You're a filthy bloodsucker.
like: Her sister Erze, strawberry parfait, fine swords, the moon.

Would I ever be able to have faith in anyone else again?...
recruit.gift: I'm not taking requests at the moment. I have my own reasons.

affinity.greet: Did I not tell you that I don't receive requests?
talk: I'm here to find someone. I don't have to tell you who it is, do I?...It's my sister. I'm looking for my sister.
We're bumping into each other quite frequently. Are you here looking for someone yourself? If it's your comrade or family, cherish them...
affinity.gift: ... Thank you, I'm just... I'm sorry, and I appreciate it.

relationship.greet: Ah, Hey... How are you?
talk: All those hellish nights Erze suffered in agony... I failed to do anything for her. Perhaps it was me that made her into what she is now. Yes, it's all my fault...
The most I can do for her is put her soul to rest. There's no other way. Whenever I think of it, I feel my heart breaking all over again... My mind refuses to raise my sword against my sister.
I... I wanted to say thank you. Thank you for talking to me... listening to me. If we meet again, then...

Some of them were Elementals, some were innocent spirits, and some even demons. It is known that tens of thousands of evil forces fell to this sword. It also has a demonic quality that binds the spirit of the slain evil to the blade. Despite its great power, fewer than 5 people in 600 years that were able to wield this sword. Seria, the 101st Heir of ShadowHilts and the only master in history chosen by the sword, entered the pact with the sword to put her beloved sister to rest.

name: Erze
subtitle: Endless thirst
description: She was a vampire hunter, just as her sister Seria was. However, corrupted by her own power, she slaughtered her comrades and chose to become a vampire herself. After killing and absorbing the powers of the high vampire who turned her, she slipped away from Seria, her older sister and the only survivor, and moved to Orvelia.
story: Born the second daughter of the ShadowHilt family, Erze also chose to become a vampire hunter after her beloved sister Seria. Erze's feeble frame kept her from learning how to fight with swords, but she managed to become known as a hunter with her talents in magic. One day she fell into a trap during an operation and was bitten by a mysterious vampire on the shoulder. Her weak constitution grew worse, and she suffered from frequent headaches and thirst every night. Erze knew what this meant and what would end up happening to her. She hid the bite and tried to find a cure on her own, distancing herself from her comrades in her efforts. Meanwhile, Seria was dispatched to Windland Snow Mountain to investigate the Vampire Princess that went missing 100 years ago. On the day her sister left... - Ahh, Seria... I cannot control it anymore... Erze quietly and secretly started slitting the throats of her comrades.
like: Seria as a sister, chocolate parfait, blood of the corrupted
dislike: Seria as a vampire hunter, spiders

inn.idle: They all look so appetizing... *Moan*

recruit.greet: I know a thrilling game we can play together. How about it?
talk: Why do you look so scared?
Why, are you afraid I'll bite you?
You've never felt thrill like this before, I guarantee you that.
recruit.gift: Ha ha, there's no need for this... Why don't you just show me your neck?

affinity.greet: I've seen you before... Ah, ha ha. We meet again.
talk: Vampires are nothing like demons. I'll admit those higher demons are decent, but the rest are pretty much worthless.
The blood of the corrupted tastes... It makes me feel ecstatic. Yes, ecstatic!
affinity.gift: You've got some good taste. And you look cuter every time I see you!

relationship.greet: I want you to have this to remember me by. It's the tooth of the one who bit me...
talk: Hmm, that woman is still chasing after me... That woman... She... My sister... I miss her... But I also want to kill her... hee hee!

The one that came up last time. He was giving out his blood to other humans. Our blood is useless without our will in it. That means he was giving his blood by choice... I wonder what he received in return? I should have asked him about it before I killed him.

No, I'd never go back to how I was like back then. Tee hee, what, do you expect me to give up this thrill I'm feeling and return to those days of despair!? No, never! I won't go back... But... if I did go back... there would only be one reason why I'd do it... Yes... If I ever go back... It would be for her.

Someone, thrill me more.

When her unquenchable thirst for blood finally settled down after razing a peaceful town to the ground, she found herself standing in complete silence on the blood-soaked ground. There was not a life that did not belong to her, and it made her want to play a beautiful tune for her silent audience. The sonata echoed around, over the mountain of dead bodies.

name: Lilia
subtitle: The Daughter of Storm and Sea
description: A Blue Dragon girl who has just passed her Hatchling period and a sister of Laias, the Priestess of Water. Although she is still inexperienced and young, those who look down on her tend to pay dearly. She uses the relentless energy of water to decimate her enemies.
story: A God Dragon of the Oasis and a sister of the Priestess of Water. Laias. She is still a young Blue Dragon who loves her sister who is much older than her. When Laias fell into a deep sleep after exhausting her powers in the battle 100 years ago, Lilia defended the Shrine of Flow on her own. It was when she heard the children of the desert making desperate prayers that she finally woke up the Priestess of Water to protect them. Unlike her mild and thoughtful sister, she is somewhat strict, and the way she controls the power of flow and water is more aggressive, too. She feels the need to protect her beautiful sister against flirting, unworthy men.
like: Laias, sweet drinks, people in the desert
dislike: Those flirting with her sister (Neraxis, Cain)

inn.idle: ...T-too many humans...

recruit.greet: May the Flow be with you!
talk: I am not as kind as my sister.
Blue Dragons are weak? You couldn't be more wrong.
I am a grown-up Dragon. I am old enough!
recruit.gift: Thanks, human child.

affinity.greet: Hello, you look great!
talk: My sister's mission is mine, too. I will always be with her.
The mystery of endless water? Umm...I heard that it is the power of the First Blue Dragon.
affinity.gift: Thank you so much. I will use this for the Shrine of Flow.

relationship.greet: Good to see you, again!
talk: Neraxis? What a jerk. He always begs for my sister's attention!
Cain...? Errrgh... I thought he was gone for good. I can't believe he's making a pass at my sister again...
I love my sister the most... but I like you as well.

ut.story: A sacred key found in the center of the oasis. When the tribe was performing an evil-purging ritual for the First Water Dragon, a strange chest floated up in the center of oasis. No one could open it until Lilia came, summoned by her tribespeople. The chest started shaking as soon as Lilia approached, and it opened on its own after releasing a bright light. Inside the chest was a key. Lilia knew as soon as she saw it that it was not an ordinary key and has been keeping it safe until now. What it opens is still unknown, but it is certain that the key maximizes Lilia's purifying powers.

name: Laudia
subtitle: Dancer of the Oasis
description: A dancer from a nomadic tribe in Aegina Desert. Her dance melts people's hearts, and her sharp blades silently take the lives of her enemies.
story: Trovatias are a nomadic tribe of Aegina Desert who inherited the tradition and religion of the ancient desert kingdom. Laudia is the daughter of the tribe leader and serves the Priestess of Water, Laias. She also looks after the tribe on behalf of her old father. When she prayed for help, God Dragon Laias and her sister Lilia woke up from their long sleep and led her and her tribe into the shrine, protecting them. Ever since, Laudia has been defeating demons in the desert with Zafir, the leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors.
like: Laias, Lilia, people in the desert

inn.idle: Oh, what an interesting place. Is there any place for me to dance?

recruit.greet: Hi. May the Flowing power be with you.
talk: Have you not seen the priestess? She is very noticeable...
Well, If you watch me dance, you won't be able to think about anything else.
I do not want to see this beautiful world being destroyed any further.
recruit.gift: Thank you for the present. Care to dance?

affinity.greet: Hi! Now that we've gotten kind of close, is it okay if I call you by your first name?
talk: I like this place. It's so calm and peaceful.
Being a deputy leader is not an easy job. I need to take care of all the people in my tribe.
affinity.gift: Thank you. I should buy some snacks for the kids...

relationship.greet: Nice to see you. Well, are you here to see me?
talk: Have you met Lilia and her sister, Laias? They are so great. I am sure you'll like them very much.
I can sense the strong vibration of the Flow and fate, which is only found in true warriors and heroes.
I made a new dance, would you like to see it some time soon? We could even dance together.

Then, some orbs of water appeared around Laudia, releasing blue, blinding light. The orbs landed upon the hands of Laudia and became a beautiful pair of earrings. It was a gift blessed by the oasis, the token of gratitude that Laias gave to Laudia in recognition of the painstaking effort Laudia made to bring her back.

name: Lucias
subtitle: Saint of Blessings
description: The High Priest of Lua and Frey's senior. Lucias's faith is strong enough to call forth Lua's blessing. Items blessed by him bear the power of Light and becomes effective weapons against demons.
story: Lucias was a member of Lua's Holy Knights before awakening as the Saint of Blessings. Under the command of the Living Legend, Ricardo, he protected Orvel and neighboring towns from Demons. However, stigmata started to appear on his body when he was 19, and by the call of Lua, the holy knight became the Saint of Blessings. His mission is to travel around the world and bring the light of Lua to those in need. He stayed true to his duties, wandering the world to share blessings. Now, he holds a weapon in his hand again to defeat the power of darkness that has been growing in strength over the past 100 years.
like: Dishes made with apple, fishing, prayer, helping people, mysterious magic shows and performances.
dislike: Rude ones, undelivered promises, taking human life lightly.

inn.idle: This place... I can feel the power of light as well as the flow of harmony.

recruit.greet: A warm greeting to you. I hope you're having a blessed day.
talk: There was a wedding ceremony nearby. Ahhh, it was such a divine sight.
Did you see Brother Baudouin? I heard he was quite drunk yesterday...
I can feel all sorts of powers here. It feels like the center of the world...
recruit.gift: May the Light bless you.

affinity.greet: It's a pleasure to have you back. Join me in saying grace before the meal.
talk: You wonder if there are Saints other than me, you say? Hmm, I haven't met them, but yes, there are three more.
I used to be a flag bearer when I was a Holy Knight. Who would have thought my halidom as a Saint would be a flag as well? Hahaha.
affinity.gift: It is so generous of you to give me a gift, but I must say it's more than I deserve. If I run into someone in need, may I give this to them?

relationship.greet: May the blessings of the Lua be with you.
talk: Oh, Stardust is here. They used to visit my hometown at least once a year when I was young. Well, should we go and see if Esker is still around?
Sometimes my memories fail me. My past, and the memories of previous Saints of Blessings tend to mix...
Holy Knight, Saint... My title does not change what I must do. I simply work to help those struggling with pain and agony.

He always carries the sword to remember his days as the Holy Knight, but he never draws it. Gossipers say that it is because he fears he would not look like a saint if he is to be seen wielding a sword...

name: Chrisha
subtitle: Inquisitor of Blood and Iron
description: Commander of Velchia, the Magic Knights of the Empire equipped with cutting-edge technomagic weapons. The knights, who are all annihilation warfare specialists, have not suffered a single defeat under her command. Chrisha is a strong knight who overpowers enemies with the power of lights with various attributes.
story: Commander of Velchia, the proud Magic Knights of the Empire, and the Inquisitor working directly under the Emperor. It is her duty to eliminate corruption, rebels, and everything else that threatens the Empire. The people of the Empire praise her and think of her as a hero, a title she has never been eager to accept. As a daughter of the Van Nosenhill family, and as a soldier of the Empire, all that matters to her is fulfilling her duties.
like: Her Family, the knights, pride, creed and valor, chess, and smart people.
dislike: Those disgraceful to the Empire, and the enemies that threaten peace of the Empire.

inn.idle: Hmm. Orvel's inn isn't half bad after all.

recruit.greet: ...What are you up to?
talk: Those eager to know about the Empire must prove themselves first.
The orders of His Majesty the Emperor are absolute and must be abided by.
I heard there is someone who is proficient in Technomagic in Orvel. I wonder what he or she is like.
recruit.gift: A gift? For me? What's the purpose of this?

affinity.greet: You've come. Is your stomach filled enough to fight?
talk: You ever play any chess?
I definitely would like to talk to the Princess of Orvelia some time.
affinity.gift: If you insist, I'll accept it.

relationship.greet: A decent knight knows when to take it easy. Get some rest.
talk: Being an Inquisitor reporting directly to His Majesty is not an easy position, but it is one that comes with pride.
*Sigh* No high officials and noblemen in the Empire or in Orvelia seem to be trustworthy.
Why don't you join the Velchia Magic Knights? I'd say you're well qualified.

Researchers, while studying to control the power of light, combined the attribute of a light-dispersing ore and the principle of Technomagic that has its roots in Elemental Magic, and came up with a brand new concept for an optical weapon.

name: Neraxis
subtitle: Obsidian Arrogance
description: The descendant of a black dragon that controlled dark lightning. He fights to rid the world of the demons, especially the Draconics. The energy of dark lightning imbued in his Pile Bunker penetrates the enemy's defense.
story: Black dragons are notorious for being the most arrogant and ill-tempered out of all dragons. They suffered greatly from the Demon War 100 years ago. Armarta went mad, Ashen Nox robbed them, and Draconics started hunting down dragons. Neraxis was one of the few black dragon that survived that day, and he has been working and plotting to realize his revenge.
dislike: Demons, Cain, Lilia, and everything that gets in his way.

inn.idle: Hmpf. What am I even doing here...?

recruit.greet: Hmph, what does a human want with me?

What do you want?
Ha, ridiculous.
recruit.gift: I don't know what you want, but it's no use.

affinity.greet: Hmph, it's you again, human.
talk: Huh? You want help? Hmpf. Bothersome.
Ha, that's right. Black dragons are the strongest!
affinity.gift: I don't need that. Why do you keep...?

relationship.greet: ...Fine, I'm glad to see you! Hmpf...

Why won't that mummy get lost? Sometimes I really want to kill him.
Why do I like Laias? Hmph, y-you don't need a reason to like someone... No, wait! How did you know!?

It holds the grudge and rage of black dragons that were killed during the Demon War. Neraxis threatened the dwarves to forge this special weapon for him. Then, he cursed and enchanted it with the grudge-filled souls of black dragons. Anyone who touches this weapon beside Neraxis will hear the raging roars of vengeful dragons.

He went to Ashen Peak, the ruins south from Arrovina Shore, and snuck into the repositorium. On the way out, he had to confront Armarta, who was mad and crazy, but it was worth it as he got everything he wanted. Among the most precious ones were the 'Ashen Nova,' which makes a pair with 'Ashen Nox'. Its power can be compared to the heart of a Black Dragon.

name: Scarlet
subtitle: Faith of Silver
description: A princess of Orvelia that truly loves her people. She wields her sword to protect the weak and support justice, as a true knight. Using a magical greatsword that disrupts mana, she cuts through her enemies.
story: King Veroglance the Second of Orvelia grew weaker by the day. He was once a stout monarch whom no one dared to cross. However, he, too, began to show weakness with age. When he finally fell ill, those with aspirations of power began gathering around him like flies. Scarlet tried her hardest to protect her father in this chaos. But the man being swayed by the flatterers around him was no longer the respected king she once knew. The king turned his back on his daughter's pleas. The nobles were unhappy to accept her, the king's only child, as the next queen, to say the least. The atmosphere of the royal palace darkened quickly. She knows. The nobles would pressure her incessantly. But she would never yield. She is prepared to fight to protect her kingdom, to protect her people. She would never let those who are greedy for power to take control of the kingdom. No matter what...

inn.idle: Hmm. Cleaner than expected.

recruit.greet: I assume you have business with me?
talk: Do not be so distant. Come closer.
Tell me more of your story.
This country is still standing due to your efforts. I thank you with all my heart.
recruit.gift: ...Tha... thank you...

affinity.greet: Good to see you.
talk: We must not forget that the people are the backbone of this country.
I'm worried about my father's illness.
affinity.gift: Thank you as always. I'll use it well.

relationship.greet: We meet again. Take a seat... let us talk.
talk: Do you also think not only the capital of Orvel, but the entirety of Orvelia, has changed...?
It would be a lie to say I am not tired... but even so, I try not to be.
I have trustworthy retainers at my side. Thanks to them, I can still go on... Haha, so obstinate and straightforward, that one.

Only a knight of noble bloodline and righteous pride can wield this sword. Those who wish to lift it must pass the trial of the royal family, a feat only accomplished by Scarlet, aside from Kyle.

name: Sonia
subtitle: The Blue Hurricane
description: A genius who was acknowledged by the Tower of Sages, while not being part of it. She was given the title of 'Blue', but her true identity is that of a homunculus. Her orbs of lightning do not even leave ash in their wake.
story: A combat homunculus created by a wizard in Orvel, who used the heart of Vikal the Lightning Beast as her core. After gaining self-awareness in the creation process, she fled the laboratory and spent the next few years at Ricardo's orphanage. She is capable of casting powerful lightning magic at will. As a combat homunculus, she boasts excellent physical abilities as well. Beneath her appearance as a young girl, she is a confused war machine searching for the meaning of her existence. The wizards of the Tower of Sage bestowed her the title of 'Blue' to indicate her mastery over chant-less spell casting. However, she distrusts wizards and has no desire to associate herself with the Tower.
like: Mirianne, and everyone at the orphanage

name: Kara
subtitle: Epitome of Ancient Technomagic
description: A human-type machine Golem made by a technomagi of a long forgotten ancient civilization. Her body is an agglomeration of ancient technology and the epitome of technomagic. She's a strong weapon that can annihilate the enemy with powerful focused fire.

But she's an ancient weapon that has no feelings and was just made to be a tool. She was asleep in the ruins of an ancient civilization, deep underground in Galluah Plains. She was excavated by Annette, a technomagi in the Kingdom of Orvel, during her research and awakened in a new era with a new civilization...

The blueprint revealed technology that was far beyond modern engineering, but she managed to interpret some of its content. The result of her study on the blueprint was this lens, which had a similar structure to the eyes of dragonflies. The lens enables the wearer to detect the tiniest of motions and catch sight of the target from hundreds of different angles. She equipped the lens on Kara, the pinnacle of Technomagic, and it resulted in a massive improvement in her attack mode change.

name: Nia
subtitle: Darkness-swallowing Eyes
description: The young leader of a barbarian tribe living in the depths of the southern jungle. She inherited the demonic blood and Demonic Eyes of Petrification from her ancestors. She restrains her enemies and finishes them off with vicious slashes.
story: An old legend has it that there was a demon that used humans as its test subjects for body modification. He cloned, fused, and modified numerous beast and human bodies with his magic. It was said that one of the test subjects that came to possess great power escaped the laboratory and created a tribe among humans. The leader of the tribe is known to have developed a mysterious ability called Demonic Eyes of Petrification. The demonic eyes, very similar to the cursed eyes of a rare beast Basilisk, are known to have the curse to turn everything they stared at into stones. Nia, the young leader of Krakashu Tribe, currently possesses these demonic eyes. This young beast, as swift as a leopard, is hunting down demons and demonic beasts to avenge her forefathers.

uw.story: A weapon forged from special metal that a shaman from Krakashu, the tribe of darkness, made by melting down living demonic beasts. The metal was then forged by the best smith in the Jungle and was reborn as a magical weapon to punish demons. A huge pair of claws embrace curse, grudge, and rage. These claws are the symbol that represents the leader of Krakashu, and they're also a medium of the spell that appeases the wrath of their forefathers. Nia became the tribe leader at such a young age and has yet to tap into all the darkness that the weapon holds, but deep at night, often when she's about to fall asleep, she can hear the howling grudge of her forefathers from the weapon.

The people in the Empire treat them as barbarians, but they are emotional and sensitive beings that present flowers to their beloved ones. For the Krakashu tribe, the bouquet of flowers means 'return home safe and sound.' This bouquet of flowers handmade by Nia's tribe members holds a spell that keeps the flowers from withering as long as Nia is healthy.

ut.story: The fame of Dragon Slayer Yanne spread not only to the Orbis Continent, but also to the Vespia empire. Yanne, a skilled monster hunter, was requested by a noble in the empire to hunt down the monsters inhabiting the Jungle of Darkness. However, the empire's ulterior motive was to drive away the natives so that they could develop the jungle and use it for their own sake. Without knowing the truth, Yanne walked into the jungle. The Krakashu tribe, led by the young leader, Nia, mistook Yanne as an imperial invader and attacked her. After Yanne subdued the tribespeople rather effortlessly with her superhuman strength, she had a talk with Nia and figured out the truths. She apologized to Nia for entering their land without permission, and gave her the necklace she made herself as a sign of reconciliation and friendship.

It is what Nia uses to remember her father, who was called by the Blue Star when she succeeded the Demonic Eyes of Petrification. This special treatment is a unique type of poison that Mediana and Requina made by the request of Yanne, who found out about Nia's status. This poison only attacks the Demonic Blood inside Nia, and it takes one sip to keep her calm. This treatment has a side effect, however, that causes her digestive system to malfunction, during which meat-loving Nia has to stay away from meat. name: Esker
subtitle: The Illusion Gambler
description: The most dangerous man in the secret gambling world. He has a strange ability to read people's minds. As soon as one gets distracted by the roll of his dice, the game's as good as lost.
story: Born with the spirit of a wandering artist, Esker was a star magician of the Stardust, a wandering theater troupe, until he was framed by Prime Minister El Moriham of Orvelia and disappeared. Just when everyone started forgetting about him, he came out to the world as one of the most dangerous gamblers in the secret gambling world. 'The Illusion Gambler.' That was what his challengers called him, trembling in fear. The gamblers that played with him all described him in a similar manner. As soon as they faced Esker's unique laughter, his soft voice, and his empty eyes, they all felt nauseated by the suspicion that the man in the front was reading their every move.
like: Mumbo Jumbo Runic Cube, Piano Concerto No. 7 of Hayedden, Silver Catfish Filet spiced with 4 drops of lemon juice.
dislike: Fishing, earthworms, con artists, everything that's spicy.

inn.idle: Shh! Don't tell anyone that you saw me.

recruit.greet: Do you want to play? I might let you win a game of two.
talk: Keep your eyes open and see. As soon as I throw this dice, a world of my creation will unfold in front of you.
Uh-oh. I know what the next roll is going to be. You lose the moment you let your opponent read your mind.
Feeling angry that I keep winning? Come on, I'll let you win next time.
recruit.gift: Is that it?

affinity.greet: Hahaha, you've gotten better! How about joining me and earning some real money?
talk: That Lucias is one stubborn idiot. Don't ever tell him that I'm here. Argh, thinking about running into him already makes me feel tired...
The secret gambling house? Hmph, you could never imagine. They won't let you sit at the table unless you bet Vampire blood. Come on, don't cry. I'm just messing with you.
affinity.gift: Forget the gift and let's grab dinner. Silver Catfish Filet spiced up with lemon juice will be perfect.

I would teach Ophelia how to shuffle cards after the performance.
When am I going back to Stardust? Well... I'll think about it if you're coming to see the performance.

uw.story: A pair dice once used by Hexipolia, the Wandering Illusion Clown. He was a renowned mage and artist in ancient times who traveled all across the continent to give joy to people and help them forget their troubles. His performance was a solace and hope to people living in confusing times, and they loved him to the extent that they made the Moon of Hexipolia after he passed away in honor of his noble spirit. However, the mentally demanding nature of Hexipolia's craft slowly gnawed into his soul, making him suffer from loneliness and depression. He wanted to give up on his natural gift, but the shadow cast upon people was just too deep; he knew too well what his performances meant to his audience. It was his destiny to amuse people. Lu Etrona Dice is what he made to amuse himself during his painful journey of entertainment. He condensed his Mana into the dice and gave it the power to form a dimensional illusion. When rolled, the dice opened up an imaginary world where Hexipolia could find some peace. The dice was passed down to the descendants of his life-long pursuit for clowning, but it disappeared when the ancient civilization collapsed. And now, the dice is in the hands of a man called the Illusion Gambler. Being used in a completely different way, against its maker's intentions... It is said that the dice appeared in Esker's hands with blinding lights when he desperately wanted to escape this world.

Her grandfather is Ricardo, the captain of Orvelia Holy Knights. She grew up watching her grandfather render justice with his heart of steel, and now dreams of realizing justice and eradicating the evil in the Empire as a member of the Resistance. Ricardo is worried for his little granddaughter since her pursuit of justice might lead her to danger. uw.story: A pair of technomagical boots made mainly with the Magic Stone of Tempest excavated from the ancient technomagic ruins. Whenever their wearer attacks, the magic stone releases an energy wave that allows the wearer to achieve supersonic speed and a power destructive enough to bend metal pillars like taffy. In fact, it was Ricardo who gave Cecilia the Magic Stone of Tempest, the core material of these boots. According to her, Ricardo was keeping it safe, though he never told her where he got it. One day, Ricardo came to visit Cecilia in the Empire, and Cecilia told him that she would join the Resistance. He saw from her eyes that her mind was set. He then gave her the Magic Stone of Tempest, saying, 'Show the world what you believe in.' Later, Landet, the geek engineer of the Resistance recognized the value of the Magic Stone and created these powerful boots.

story: Hero Concept Design Contest Winner [87CEFA]Mochi00 (JPN)[-] Few years ago, small towns all over Orbis were attacked by the undead army of Malduk. They were seeking out albino kids, ones who were born with unique and powerful magic. Malduk's subordinates captured these children, and injected them with crimson arcane crystals, a powerful energy source for Demons. The goal of this experiment was to transform them into crimson arcane crystal living mines - that would mass produce crimson arcane crystals until the moment they die. Pain from the inhumane experiment took its toll on the children and one by one, losing their lives. Children who weren't compatible with the crimson arcane crystal were petrified and crumbled into dust. The remaining children who witnessed this horror were shaking with fear, and hopelessly awaited their death. But the experiment finally came to a success. Crimson arcane crystals resonated with Kirze, and she absorbed all the crystals in the area. As a result, she gained vast amount of mana and gained ability to manipulate crimson arcane crystals at her will. With her new found power, Kirze defeated Malduk's subordinates and fled from the lab with the surviving children. In the hopes of preventing further casualties like herself, Kirze took off and began to hunt rouge demons that crossed her path...

story: A man who has lost his memory. Test subject Type. 0 that was born as a part of the human enhancement experiment of the empire. As the first type of the Project Evil Knights that were only made to kill, Chase was brought through a secretive contract with the empire to assassinate the sole successor to its throne, Scarlet. However, he went berserk for unknown reasons during a fight against Clause and Demia who were guarding Scarlet, and he abandoned his mission and left. He failed to kill Scarlet and disappeared, so the nobles who had commissioned the assassination found themselves in trouble. In the end, they hired another assassination group, the Laughing Mask, to have him killed. However, Scarlet already gave him a name, Chase, and let him stay by her side.

Enhanced Human Type. 0 destroyed everything as soon as he woke up from the laboratory in order to find a weapon that could withstand his power. In the end, he tore out the horn of the monster Cannibal, which was known to have swallowed Arrogance out of the 7 sins. This horn went through the hands of the greatest blacksmiths of the empire and became the Blood Lancer Monolith. The flame of sin is burning inside the weapon, and whatever it pierces cannot be healed. The feeling of striking with this weapon is pleasurable enough to make him forget about the lingering attachment to his lost memory.

Demia watched him for a few days, and one day, patting his shoulder, she nonchalantly gave Chase the pauldron. Stamped on the capsule is the test subject code name, 'Type. 0,' and it contains a strange red material that stores information. This biometric sensor can store various tests and research information and logs the information of the test subject's location. If someone tries to take it out with force, it will self-detonate and kill the test subject to keep the experiments confidential. When Chase ripped this out of his waist, he broke it instantly. This small thing had been distorting his soul for too long. Then, he made a promise himself. He wanted to make those who drove him to misery tremble in fear, just from hearing his name.

name: Dakaris
subtitle: Sage of the Lake
description: A sage of the Lizardmen from Lake Eretana, a place seized by the Empire. In order to liberate his homeland, he co-founded the Resistance 8 years ago. He utilizes traditional tribal magic, which brings chaos to enemies.
story: As the Empire expanded its territory, the long occupying natives resisted relentlessly. However, they all eventually fell before the Empire's brutal military force as well as overwhelming technology. Dakaris' homeland, the reclusive Lake Eretana, hidden deep inside the mountains, was no exception. The Empire let the natives stay in their land, but by no means were they treated with respect. To make things worse, the officers and nobles appointed to the area were mostly corrupted, making it even more difficult for the natives. The noble appointed to Lake Eretana was especially the worse. The atrocities grew worse each day, eventually leading to the deaths of young, and innocent Lizardmen. This lead Dakaris to gather his tribe to get back their freedom. 'To soothe the spirits of my ancestors, and to liberate my tribe - I will not hesitate, I will take back our rightful future with the Resistance.' Currently, he is a key member of the Resistance, leading them with his wisdom and insight.

name: Bernheim
subtitle: Sword of Destruction
description: The Knight of Silence, Dark Swordsman, and Earthshaking Sword. These are the names that this legendary mercenary earned in the Empire. His giant sword can absorb any kind of power to bring about utter destruction.
story: Born in a noble family in Penteonia, Bernheim von Lachelima was gifted with outstanding martial skills. He had the strength of a giant and excellent judgment, so it was undeniable that he would make a great knight. However, he had a fatal flaw that kept him from being successful in Penteonia: He could not use the power of light at all. No matter how hard he tried, how strong his faith and will were, the power of light did not answer to his calling. Although all he ever wanted was to serve his nation and the Queen, the fact that his incapability was keeping him from being more than a low-level knight frustrated him. Bernheim did not give up and trained hard to handle the power of light, but his constant lack of progress slowly started to weaken his mind. One day, he visited the Central Church to study the power of light and its mechanism. It was when he was quietly reading a book that he heard a sound. It was an angelic voice calling for him. The long-accumulated frustration of Bernheim led him to where the voice was coming from, a room sealed with multiple magic barriers in the basement of the church. As he moved closer to it, the barriers vanished as if they were never there. What he saw inside the room was a sword in the shape of an angel, exuding blinding light. 'You are the chosen one', said the sword, drawing him near with holy light. Thinking that his relentless effort had finally paid off, he slowly grasped the sword. Then, his mind was drawn into the deepest darkness. The darkness that captured him—it was the endless shadowy void of futility. A vessel that could never be filled; a whole other universe. In the vast darkness, Bernheim felt his mind deteriorating and his existence fading away. His mind and body was slowly being encroached by a dark, ominous power. However, Bernheim was also one of the Penteonian Knights, a Knight of Light who swore not to be defeated by darkness. He rose from the shrouding darkness, regaining consciousness with his indomitable spirit. When he came to his senses, lying on the floor, there was a giant black sword in his hand. The demonic sword with the appearance of a demon was laughing and mocking the knight who broke away from the path of light. Eventually, Bernheim was banished from Penteonia, and he started to live a new life as a mercenary in Vespia Empire with that malicious, foul-mouthed demonic sword in his hand...

It has the power to absorb all forms of energy, evil or holy, to use them as its own. It has its own will, and a character that is very temperamental, scatterbrained, and cruel. Even Queen Artemia does not know the exact reason why this demonic sword was sealed under the Central Church in Penteonia, but rumor says that Targarios was a Dark Lord in the distant past. Considering its frivolous character, that might seem unlikely. However, there is no doubt that it has devastating powers.

She is a Vice Captain in Empire Capital Guard Knights, the highest post taken by a knight with a background as a commoner. With her fierce combat skills along with her modesty and strong sense of responsibility, being a knight is her calling of life. There's no doubt that Glenwys is the hope for all commoners of the Empire, considering that she earned her way to the position of Vice Captain and that she won the 3 fighting tournaments that the Emperor held himself. As a symbol of the belief that anyone with skills can achieve success in the Empire, she is receiving a lot of attention from many.

ut.story: The Annual Imperial Colosseum Tournament was where all the courageous fighter could compete to prove their worth, regardless of their origins and social ranks, but the winner was always a well-equipped nobleman, knight, or soldier sponsored by noble families. Everyone knew it was no longer fair, but no one would dare say it out loud. However, Glenwys, a 16-year-old commoner girl who had no strings to pull, won the tournament 4 years ago and the noble purpose of the competition was regained. On the day of her victory, the Colosseum was filled with thundering applause of the audience who were longing to see haughty aristocrats lose what they thought belonged to them. Glenwys became a new idol of the Empire, and people were buying gifts for her. Glenwys, however, had to turn down all the gifts. Not only was the national attention too much for her, but she also knew that those with power would never take joy in seeing commoners rally around a hero like her. Nevertheless, she could not say no to a timid little girl that came holding a paperweight made of dandelions in her small hands, and it became the only present that she kept for herself.

ut.story: The last present from an anonymous supporter. Glenwys became the first tournament winner with a commoner's background, but what she needed to pay to defend her position in the following Imperial Colosseum Tournaments was far above an ordinary commoner's income. Most of her participation fee would come from the donations of citizens, but the time eventually came when the cost got too expensive for her to carry on competing. However, to her surprise, help came for her from an anonymous supporter every time she was desperate for it, enabling her to continue fighting. On the day that she became the winner of 3 consecutive tournaments, the 'Ballas Ruby,' a jewel of a knight, was delivered to her, which became the last gesture of support she ever got from the nameless helper. Since then, this ruby became her charm of victory that she always carries with her, grateful, but curious about who the supporter might be.

ut.story: A golden trophy awarded to Glenwys for winning 3 consecutive Imperial Colosseum Tournaments. It's the Emperor's gift to the true hero of the Colosseum. The third championship match was the last tournament match in which Glenwys fought in. Her last opponent was a mysterious man with a mask who defeated all his opponents throughout the tournament in less than a few seconds. Glenwys was nervous when she saw him fight in the semi-final match. As expected, the fight was one-sided. A man swung a pair of red swords at Glenwys like a red storm. She waited for an opportunity while blocking his fierce attacks. The man finally seemed to let his guard down, and Glenwys launched a powerful strike. But to her surprise, the man dodged it simply by taking a few steps back. However, the explosion caused by Glenwys's attack made the man's mask crack, revealing his handsome face. She then saw, through the breaking mask, that the man was smiling. Noticing that her attack didn't leave a scratch on him, Glenwys raised her shield up again, appalled, but the man suddenly threw the towel. Soon, the smoke around the two people cleared, and there was another mask on the man's face. Shocked and astonished, Glenwys could not understand what had happened until the Emperor handed her the trophy, until she saw the man standing behind the Emperor with the Royal Guard Captain, giving her a warm applause.

story: A genius scholar from the Tower of Sage who remembers everything she sees. After developing her own theories and systems of Rune Magic, she quickly grew bored and moved onto a different subject. Soon, she was appointed as the highest ranking royal secretary of finance. Unfortunately, many politicians refused to accept a commoner as their superior. After many lies and ill rumors, Veronica eventually decided to leave the palace on her own. But this was hardly a defeat for her, and she soon set out to conquer a new path. She headed to the Orvel Guild Alliance, where she would be measured only by her abilities and nothing else. As expected, her incredible perception and analytical skills made her an indispensable asset to numerous guilds.

story: If one were to choose the most trustworthy among the Guardian Knights, Loman's name would be one of the first to come to mind. The royal family trusts him so much that they appointed Loman as the Gatekeeper of the Orvel Monarchy. He is usually a gentle and friendly man, but becomes uncompromising when anyone tries to approach his king without royal permission. No one who has seen his halberd, the one bestowed by Scarlet, split the air has ever returned alive. While off duty, however, he is a sensitive man who enjoys wood carving as a hobby.

talk: My family has guarded the Orvel Monarchy for centuries. When I came to the castle, my father gave me our family heirloom.
This halberd seems to be pretty special. I asked Jin, and he told me that it holds the essence of some ancient divine beast.
affinity.gift: What? I must tell you, I won't open the vault or labyrinth for you. Ha ha.

relationship.greet: Guarding the monarchy is an important and solemn duty, but sometimes I feel a little jealous of my colleagues since they can come and go as they place.

Wood carving is an old hobby of mine. Before I realized it, my room became crammed with my woodwork. Haha.

uw.story: The halberd held by an ancient guardian statue defending the gate of the labyrinth that was recently discovered at the Royal Underground. The old, eroded statue was holding the halberd firmly in its hands, as if showing its determination to protect the labyrinth against intruders. Loman, who was in charge of the labyrinth excavation, felt something indescribably sublime from the statue and showed due courtesy in front of it. At that moment, the statue dropped its halberd to the ground and began to crumble away. The halberd itself seemed unaffected by time and was imbued with a mysterious energy. 'That statue suddenly crumbled and dropped the halberd...' Scarlet said, glancing over the report. 'Yes, ma'am.' Scarlet then gazed at Loman. 'The unyielding sincerity of protecting a place until his very body collapses... I know a man like that.' 'Pardon, ma'am?' He looked at Scarlet with a puzzled face as she handed over the halberd, smiling.

It was just a pastime at first, but soon it became his hobby, a passion that filled his room with hundreds of sculptures. And one day, Loman started to make wooden dolls to give to his friends and his men. Back then, sorcerous dolls known to protect hearts from evil were popular in Orvelia. Loman asked an old shaman who practiced ancient folk remedies to enchant his wooden dolls with a spell of protection, and he gave them to his colleagues.

The owners of this item have said the same thing. When they resolve to stake their lives to defend what is important to them, they invoke a mighty power like the waves of the sea. She once received an offer to work as the Royal Chef, but she refused it and opened an inn to let everyone enjoy her dishes. Her inn soon became one of the most famous attractions in Orvel, visited by countless adventurers. Now people call her inn 'the Hero's Inn,' and she's enjoying her life among the 'heroes.'

When Gladi began to spend more time running a shop than conquering the Arena, Nicky lost interest too and found another job. Somewhat skilled in training monsters, she applied to be the Stockade's Chief Guard, which is a dangerous yet well-paid job. While the inmates usually refrain from doing anything out of their fear for her, from time to time, they would lose all sense of reason and cause a scene. uw.story: The mace wielded by the Chief Guard to keep the inmates under control. It is known as the Mace of Rehabilitation for the unruly monsters in captivity. Although it was passed down from one Stockade Chief Guard in Orvelia to another across generations, soon after Nicky became the new chief, she broke a part of the mace while mercilessly swinging it at the prisoners. -......... She was staring at the broken mace when she turned her eyes to the prisoners. Her eyes stopped at the Hell Beast Hartnon whose entire body was covered with horns. A cruel grin appeared on her face. - You! You've got a pretty eyeball for a piece of trash! In time, the monster's eye went through Blacksmith Jin's hands and became Nicky's new mace. The new mace was perfect for her. The horns sprouting from the mace exuded an excruciating curse, while the deep grudge ingrained in the monster's iris offering ensured a soul-crushing pain. The inmates began to call the new mace 'Hartnon' in remembrance of the beast sacrificed for the weapon. Nicky felt a surge of incomparable pleasure whenever she'd swing the new mace at the prisoners.

Different monsters had different blood colors, and her nails would get very messy after. One day, she was letting loose a stream of abuse, infuriated by her messy nails, when she saw a lady with nails of various colors and came up with an idea. If she didn't like her nails getting stained with different colors, all she had to do was put some dark color on her nails beforehand! She picked the monsters with the darkest blood and made a bottle of special manicure. She now applies it on her nails every waste disposal day. When she comes into the Stockade with her nails in black, all the prisoners shiver in fear of death.

name: Hanus
subtitle: Instructor of Open Fire
description: The youngest instructor of the Guild Allied Forces who trains soldiers of the Alliance from the Command Center. Also being a genius at weapon modifications and strategy planning, she utilizes her own handcrafted firearms to lay waste to the enemies.
story: Hanus was only 13 when the Guild Allied Forces recruited her. She is known as the legendary girl who was also called as the little giantess of the battlefield. As the daughter of the guild master of a weapon guild, Hanus used to play with discarded firearms and blades when she was young. This is when the others discovered her ingenuity in arms. The Guild Alliance decided that they cannot allow such profound talent to go to waste. The Alliance, after barely managing to convince Hanus' father who fiercely disagreed with the Alliance's decision, recruited her. Hanus was trained along with other soldiers, and just as the Guild had expected, she displaced her talent on battlefield. Hanus' revolutionary weapons were ridiculously strong enough to shift the paradigm of warfare. Her craftmanship, combined with her masterful tactics, marked the birth of an ultimate soldier of the Allied Forces. Moreover, Hanus herself vastly enjoyed her life in the army, as she could utilize her handcrafted weapons to their fullest. However, great talent meant more demands and battles to fight. During an operation, Hanus ended up being wounded. Upon hearing this news about her daughter's injury, Hanus' father who detested seeing his daughter in the army ever since the early days, raised his voice against the Alliance, and strongly demanded her daughter to be discharged from service at once. However, as people say, no parents are strong enough to bend their child's will. Hanus, who would rather die than be discharged from service, persistently persuaded her father. In the end, she managed to get her father's approval, under the condition that she stays in the military only as an instructor that doesn't participate in battles. Currently, Hanus thinks that her life as an instructor is not too bad at all, but deep inside, she still yearns to return to battlefields. Inside the Command Center, she silently awaits for the day when she will finally stand on the battlefield with comrades whom she taught.

uw.story: At one point, Hanus, in a greatly enraged state, utilized all of her knowledge and skills she possessed to craft this enigmatic firearm. She uses this weapon against a target who makes her angry. This deadly weapon named Hanus Type-0 is loaded with special bullets that corrodes the target's body upon hit. Not only that, this weapon also fires a tracking bullet now and then, making it impossible for a target to escape Hanus. If anyone could create this intricate firearm other than Hanus, perhaps it would be geniuses such as the head researcher of Magos Le'Flamme, or the one regarded as the famous genius technomagi of Orvel. The story behind the creation of this weapon is an interesting tale to tell. In the past, when Hanus was achieving much with her feat, she was assigned to a smuggler elimination operation. During the mission, the ringleader of the smuggling connection insulted Hanus whilst escaping the scene: 'The children's playground is over there. You should go and play a war game with your friends instead.' Enraged to the max, Hanus fought with everything she had, but Hanus had to retreat due to the sheer number of bodyguards protecting the ringleader. Hanus was enraged for days over the fact that she had allowed the criminal who insulted her to escape right in front of her. Then, on the day of the follow-up operation to eliminate the smuggling connection, Hanus brought this strange gun to the mission. On that very day, one shot from her gun concluded the elimination operation. As she shot her gun, she said to herself: 'It's play time.'

ut.story: A hat of Hanus' comrade who recognized Hanus as her comrade on the battlefield for the first time. Although Hanus had been recruited by the army due to her ingenious craftsmanship, she had to endure all sorts of insults and neglections that were directed to her, just because she was young. Amidst the hardships however, there was one person who recognized Hanus' ability for the first time. Starting from then, as time went by, more and more soldiers started to recognize Hanus as their comrades, or even something more than that. To Hanus, this person was someone precious, and grateful. However, their friendship came to a temporary halt when Hanus had to change position within the army. Seeing Hanus cry for the first time, this comrade smiled gently and gave her hat to Hanus which she had worn in battles as a token of friendship and respect. She promised to see each other again on the battlefield, where both of them fought so hard together.

ut.story: The first firearm that Hanus modified in her earlier days. It is then when Hanus' ingenuity first surfaced. While playing with blades and firearms, she remembered her father's big gun which was kept inside her father's room. Hanus' father once told her that despite its great firepower, the gun was ultimately deemed unsuitable for combat due to its massive weight. When Hanus saw the gun however, she felt that the gun could be modified appropriately. After contemplating for some time, she sneaked the gun from her father's room. After a few days, the gun was successfully modified into a tiny gun that fits Hanus. Hanus' father scolded her harshly for touching his gun without permission, but he could not hide his surprise when he saw the modified gun. Even though the gun's weight had been dramatically decreased, its firepower remained the same. After seeing this insane weapon, Hanus' father felt that her daughter's craftmanship is something extraordinary. Even more amazing is the fact that all this took place when Hanus was just 5 years old.

This doll is extremely popular among children, but the extra-limited edition belongs to Hanus only. Everyday, Hanus changes the doll's highest-quality clothes, and equips the doll with her handcrafted toy gun. As it got fitted with more things, it started resembeling Hanus that people began calling the doll Mini Hanus. ut.story: A medal Hanus received for her numerous, remarkable achievements she accomplished during her time in the Guild Allied Forces. As a great tactician, Hanus always brought advantages in battles, and the army bestowed the medal to her in recognition of her achievements. Such recognition was unprecedented considering Hanus' age and experience, and those who did not know Hanus well complained to the higher ups in envy of her accomplishments. However, after seeing Hanus in battle once, they did not dare to complain about the army's decision. Hanus, even after being transferred to the instructor position due to her father, still keeps this medal, and reflects upon it whenever she wishes to go back to battlefields.
